<div class="mw-parser-output"><table class="wikitable cautiontable">
<tbody><tr>
<th>Warning!
</th></tr>
<tr>
<td>
<ul><li>Ratings are maintained by FFBE subreddit's Discord. <b>Newbie questions and question whether a certain unit is good or not should be asked in <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://discord.gg/RRKTNWc">#global-help</a></b>. If you have experience with the game you may freely discuss unit ratings in <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://discord.gg/8HWa5dT">#wiki-unit-ratings</a>.</li>
<li>These lists provide a rough estimate of units' utility when used by newbies. Veterans should assess the unit based on their needs instead.</li>
<li><b>Units that have summaries, but not ratings are too weak to use outside of <i>extremely</i> narrow circumstances.</b></li>
<li>The ratings for attackers are calculated using a unit builder based on specific criteria. Visit <a href="/Unit_Rating_Notes" title="Unit Rating Notes">Unit Rating Notes</a>.</li>
<li>Updates: Read recent changes <a href="/Unit_Rankings/Updates" title="Unit Rankings/Updates">here</a>.</li></ul>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
<h2><span id="Unit_Ratings_(7★_Units)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Unit_Ratings_.287.E2.98.85_Units.29">Unit Ratings (7★ Units)</span></h2>
<dl><dd><i>Only units that can be awakened to <span style="white-space:nowrap;"><span style="margin-right: 4px; font-family: Arial">7</span><span style="display:none">-star</span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; top:-2px;"><img alt="7 Star Rarity" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/7/77/Rarity-7.png?version=fd8f39570124b445047461d4ec076cde" title="7 Star Rarity" width="22" height="22" /></span></span> are rated.</i></dd>
<dd><i>Please keep in mind that each list considers that players have fully ability awakened a unit's kit.</i></dd>
<dd><i>Please read the <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="https://lapis-prod-staticnews-gumi-sg.akamaized.net/prod//en/content/201807307intro7Star9.html">in-game news</a> to learn how to awaken a 7★ to avoid any confusion or mistakes.</i></dd></dl>

<h2><span id="Unit_Ratings_(6★_Units)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Unit_Ratings_.286.E2.98.85_Units.29">Unit Ratings (6★ Units)</span></h2>
<dl><dd><i>Only units that can be awakened to <span style="white-space:nowrap;"><span style="margin-right: 4px; font-family: Arial">6</span><span style="display:none">-star</span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; top:-2px;"><img alt="6 Star Rarity" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/6/63/Rarity-6.png?version=6ee5d2a814c4c075a01ee956a4ae7e6f" title="6 Star Rarity" width="20" height="20" /></span></span> are rated, since <span style="white-space:nowrap;"><span style="margin-right: 4px; font-family: Arial">5</span><span style="display:none">-star</span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; top:-2px;"><img alt="5 Star Rarity" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/c/cd/Rarity-5.png?version=4490109e4f64ae4c7c24548c326ec5e6" title="5 Star Rarity" width="20" height="20" /></span></span> units are now generally obsolete.</i></dd>
<dd><i>The archives (&gt;6 months unupdated) for <a href="/Unit_Ratings_(5%E2%98%85_Units)" title="Unit Ratings (5★ Units)">5★ Units</a>, <a href="/Unit_Ratings_(4%E2%98%85_Units)" title="Unit Ratings (4★ Units)">4★ Units</a>, and their <a href="/Role_Rankings_(No_5%E2%98%85)" title="Role Rankings (No 5★)">non-5★ roles</a> and <a href="/Role_Rankings" title="Role Rankings">6★ roles</a> are still available.</i></dd></dl>
<table class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" width="100%">
<tbody><tr>
<th colspan="7"><a href="/Unit_Ratings_(6%E2%98%85_Units)" title="Unit Ratings (6★ Units)">Unit Ratings (6★ Units)</a>
</th></tr>

<td><img alt="Magical-Damage" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/9/91/Role-Magical-Damage.png/99px-Role-Magical-Damage.png?version=c4a07f67b24fc11ece67256a974d6040" width="99" height="24" srcset="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/9/91/Role-Magical-Damage.png/148px-Role-Magical-Damage.png?version=c4a07f67b24fc11ece67256a974d6040 1.5x, https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/9/91/Role-Magical-Damage.png/197px-Role-Magical-Damage.png?version=c4a07f67b24fc11ece67256a974d6040 2x" /><br /><img alt="Support" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/0/0c/Role-Support.png/99px-Role-Support.png?version=9e9ff6ca620488c7ba24b3471eac2b1d" width="99" height="24" srcset="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/0/0c/Role-Support.png/148px-Role-Support.png?version=9e9ff6ca620488c7ba24b3471eac2b1d 1.5x, https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/0/0c/Role-Support.png/197px-Role-Support.png?version=9e9ff6ca620488c7ba24b3471eac2b1d 2x" /><br />
</td>
<td class="unit-rating" style="color:#BBBBBB;" data-sort-value="10.1">-
</td>
<td class="unit-rating" style="color:#777777;">10.0
</td>
<td style="text-align:left;"><a href="/Orran" title="Orran">Unit Page</a><br /><a href="#Orran">Summary Notes</a>
</td></tr>

<tr>
<td><a href="/Vaan" title="Vaan"><img alt="Unit-Vaan-6.png" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/1/10/Unit-Vaan-6.png?version=f36e0ad52e37576ef77e7cd39d7c84ff" width="92" height="91" /></a><br /><span style="color:#C8783C;">Vaan</span>
</td>
<td><span style="white-space:nowrap;"><span style="margin-right: 4px; font-family: Arial">3</span><span style="display:none">-star</span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; top:-2px;"><img alt="3 Star Rarity" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/f/f2/Rarity-3.png?version=af4e922c90ba20f291d3c156dd1e2f5c" title="3 Star Rarity" width="20" height="20" /></span></span>
</td>
<td><img alt="Chaining" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/3/3b/Role-Chaining.png/99px-Role-Chaining.png?version=b8fc719363d3104918cbb0e1027b4ead" width="99" height="24" srcset="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/3/3b/Role-Chaining.png/148px-Role-Chaining.png?version=b8fc719363d3104918cbb0e1027b4ead 1.5x, https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/3/3b/Role-Chaining.png/197px-Role-Chaining.png?version=b8fc719363d3104918cbb0e1027b4ead 2x" /><br /><img alt="Physical-Damage" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/9/9a/Role-Physical-Damage.png/99px-Role-Physical-Damage.png?version=3c27a106aecdfca572162f6436db8662" width="99" height="24" srcset="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/9/9a/Role-Physical-Damage.png/148px-Role-Physical-Damage.png?version=3c27a106aecdfca572162f6436db8662 1.5x, https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/9/9a/Role-Physical-Damage.png/197px-Role-Physical-Damage.png?version=3c27a106aecdfca572162f6436db8662 2x" /><br /><img alt="Support" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/0/0c/Role-Support.png/99px-Role-Support.png?version=9e9ff6ca620488c7ba24b3471eac2b1d" width="99" height="24" srcset="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/0/0c/Role-Support.png/148px-Role-Support.png?version=9e9ff6ca620488c7ba24b3471eac2b1d 1.5x, https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/thumb/0/0c/Role-Support.png/197px-Role-Support.png?version=9e9ff6ca620488c7ba24b3471eac2b1d 2x" /><br />
</td>
<td class="unit-rating" style="color:#C8783C;">10.0
</td>
<td class="unit-rating" style="color:#777777;">9.5
</td>

<td><span style="white-space:nowrap;"><span style="margin-right: 4px; font-family: Arial">4</span><span style="display:none">-star</span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; top:-2px;"><img alt="4 Star Rarity" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/exvius_gamepedia_en/b/bf/Rarity-4.png?version=ff81d919ca5190c6c0885d9c70db5eff" title="4 Star Rarity" width="20" height="20" /></span></span>

<p><br />
</p>
<h2><span id="Unit_Summaries_(6★_Units)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Unit_Summaries_.286.E2.98.85_Units.29"><a href="/Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)" title="Unit Summaries (6★ Units)">Unit Summaries (6★ Units)</a></span></h2>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="2B"><a href="/2B" title="2B">2B</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-1" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-1" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical damage dealer with solid output.</li>
<li>Innate dual wield and varied weapon selection make her easy to gear.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="9S"><a href="/9S" title="9S">9S</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-2" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-2" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Support unit with decent stat breaks, several imperils, and a 30% party mitigation buff.</li>
<li>Unfortunately, his dual-stat breaks are split the wrong way-- ATK/DEF and MAG/SPR, rather than ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR, which means you need a second breaker to survive the first turn anyways.</li>
<li>His LB is a tad more powerful than his on-demand breaks, but only when maxed, which may not be worth the investment.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="A2"><a href="/A2" title="A2">A2</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-3" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-3" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical damage dealer with solid output.</li>
<li>Innate dual wield and varied weapon selection make her easy to gear.</li>
<li>Her primary chaining move, <a href="/Offensive_Heal_Combo" title="Offensive Heal Combo">Offensive Heal Combo</a>, has unique chaining frames which means the chains may break depending on various factors. She's best paired with herself.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ace"><a href="/Ace" title="Ace">Ace</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-4" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-4" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Without ability awakenings, he is unremarkable.</li>
<li>With ability awakenings, he becomes a good instant mana battery, which is useful for story events, as well as trial bosses that drain MP.</li>
<li>He provides powerful imperils for fire, light, and lightning.</li>
<li>His personal damage output is fairly low, or too rng-based to be practical.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Adam"><a href="/Adam" title="Adam">Adam</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-5" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-5" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Adam wants to be a provoke tank. Unfortunately, he can't provoke.</li>
<li>Leave him on the bench.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Adam_Jensen"><a href="/Adam_Jensen" title="Adam Jensen">Adam Jensen</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-6" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-6" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mid-tier lightning physical chainer with innate dual wield.</li>
<li>Has a 45% full break.</li>
<li>Lacks chaining partners, and his chains always break in the middle.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Agrias"><a href="/Agrias" title="Agrias">Agrias</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-7" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-7" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Without ability awakenings, she's an average light chainer with not enough ATK.</li>
<li>With ability awakenings (more specifically, <a href="/Divine_Ruination_(Agrias)" title="Divine Ruination (Agrias)">Divine Ruination</a> +2), she can chain that 7-hit ability with <a href="/Orlandeau" title="Orlandeau">Orlandeau</a> and the rest of the DR family.</li>
<li>Her own damage is still not great due to her stats, but she'll see some use in 10-man trials if you need a chaining partner.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aileen"><a href="/Aileen" title="Aileen">Aileen</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-8" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-8" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid earth physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Piledriver" title="Piledriver">Piledriver</a> family.</li>
<li>She's a walking chainer, which means that her chains may break on some enemies depending on where the game has them positioned.</li>
<li>Has a bit of utility-- minor AoE MP regen and earth resist.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aloha_Lasswell"><a href="/Aloha_Lasswell" title="Aloha Lasswell">Aloha Lasswell</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-9" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-9" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good wind/water physical chainer with innate dual wield.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Amelia"><a href="/Amelia" title="Amelia">Amelia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-10" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-10" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Has innate dual wield for guns only.</li>
<li>Can be used as a physical chainer if you're desperate, but her damage is very low.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ang"><a href="/Ang" title="Ang">Ang</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-11" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-11" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good physical fire chainer. Unlike most units, his chaining move is delayed by a turn, but will always spark chain perfectly with a copy of himself.</li>
<li>After spending several turns chaining, use his limit burst, which is the source of most of his damage.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aranea"><a href="/Aranea" title="Aranea">Aranea</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-12" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-12" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Aranea wants to be a physical damage dealer. Sadly, she's not very good at her job.</li>
<li>Her damage output is alarmingly terrible for a unit of her rarity.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aria"><a href="/Aria" title="Aria">Aria</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-13" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-13" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good healer with AoE 100% revive and support spells.</li>
<li>As with most 3* and 4* healers, she needs a dualcast materia (or Holy Wand) to shine.</li>
<li>Can also provide a bit of MP regen for the party, although it can be hard to fit this in since she can't heal on the turn that she uses it.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Arngrim"><a href="/Arngrim" title="Arngrim">Arngrim</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-14" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-14" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar fire physical solo damage dealer.</li>
<li>Burns through MP very quickly while not dealing much damage.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ashe"><a href="/Ashe" title="Ashe">Ashe</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-15" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-15" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Non-elemental magical chainer with healing effects attached to her damage skill (Heaven's Fury).</li>
<li>She can also use Thundaja to serve as a competent (but not amazing) solo damage dealer.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ashteroze"><a href="/Ashteroze" title="Ashteroze">Ashteroze</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-16" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-16" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Can break ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR, but the breaks are a bit subpar. Could be useful if you're new and desperate for a breaker.</li>
<li>The rest of her kit is poison focused, so completely irrelevant.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Atoning_Dragoon_Kain"><a href="/Atoning_Dragoon_Kain" title="Atoning Dragoon Kain">Atoning Dragoon Kain</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-17" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-17" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical chainer with elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>His damage output is okay but not amazing.</li>
<li>Can chain with <a href="/Lila" title="Lila">Lila</a> and the <a href="/Piledriver" title="Piledriver">Piledriver</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aura"><a href="/Aura" title="Aura">Aura</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-18" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-18" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent wind physical chainer.</li>
<li>Finding chaining partners will be nigh-impossible since friends won't be using her.</li>
<li>Her ability awakenings increase her damage significantly, but she still falls far short of being top tier.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Auron"><a href="/Auron" title="Auron">Auron</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-19" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-19" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent physical wind/fire chainer with good breaks.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aurora_Fryevia"><a href="/Aurora_Fryevia" title="Aurora Fryevia">Aurora Fryevia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-20" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-20" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Great light hybrid chainer with several chaining families.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Aureole_Ray" title="Aureole Ray">Aureole Ray</a>, <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a>, and <a href="/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> families.</li>
<li>Burns through her MP very quickly.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Awakened_Rain"><a href="/Awakened_Rain" title="Awakened Rain">Awakened Rain</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-21" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-21" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely durable magic cover tank and provoke tank.</li>
<li>Has a 60% MAG break and 60% stat buffs.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ayaka"><a href="/Ayaka" title="Ayaka">Ayaka</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-22" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-22" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Ayaka is an excellent healer. She has access to Curaja, Reraise, Esunaga, Full Life, and Dispelga, allowing her to handle all of the standard healing duties better than almost any other unit in the game.</li>
<li>Has innate dualcast, and can serve as an MP battery for the team by using Dedication.</li>
<li>Is immune to Stop and can cure it.</li>
<li>With her ability awakenings, she can also slightly fill the LB gauges of teammates and grant Stop immunity.</li></ul>
<h4><span id="Bai_Hu_&amp;_Zhu_Que"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Bai_Hu_.26_Zhu_Que"><a href="/Bai_Hu_%26_Zhu_Que" title="Bai Hu &amp; Zhu Que">Bai Hu &amp; Zhu Que</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-23" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-23" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Great fire/lightning physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li>
<li>Can temporarily unlock Q-cast.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Balthier"><a href="/Balthier" title="Balthier">Balthier</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-24" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-24" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>A subpar physical finisher with elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Takes a couple of turns to ramp up as he goes through his rotation.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Barbariccia"><a href="/Barbariccia" title="Barbariccia">Barbariccia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-25" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-25" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent AoE wind magic chainer.</li>
<li>Can provide MP regen and lightning/wind resistance. With ability awakenings, can also buff the team's mitigation by 25%.</li>
<li>Her personal MP consumption is a bit on the high side, so she may have trouble on longer fights without a battery.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Barret"><a href="/Barret" title="Barret">Barret</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-26" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-26" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer, hampered by terrible equipment selection, a dearth of passives, and lack of chaining partners.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Bart"><a href="/Bart" title="Bart">Bart</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-27" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-27" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Bizarre mix of dodge-based provoke tank, support, and physical chainer.</li>
<li>Can provide 60% AoE breaks, AoE LB fill rate, and some minor AoE MP sustain.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Kingsglaive" title="Kingsglaive">Kingsglaive</a>, <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a>, and <a href="/Flood" title="Flood">Flood</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Bartz"><a href="/Bartz" title="Bartz">Bartz</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-28" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-28" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Dated physical damage dealer with a focus towards wind.</li>
<li>Can suicide to refill an ally's HP/MP. Also has Entrust.</li>
<li>With ability awakenings, can suicide to provide reraise to one ally.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Barusa"><a href="/Barusa" title="Barusa">Barusa</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-29" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-29" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical cover tank and provoke tank.</li>
<li>Without his ability awakenings, he's mediocre at best. With them, he's extremely durable and an solid unit overall.</li>
<li>Can buff physical or magical mitigation for himself or an ally, with an accompanying DEF or SPR buff, respectively.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Basch"><a href="/Basch" title="Basch">Basch</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-30" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-30" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Amazing cover tank-- can cover either magical or physical attacks (but can only cover one type at a time).</li>
<li>Has an excellent gear selection, making it easy to gear him for elemental resistances.</li>
<li>Has great dual-stat breaks for ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR, as well as slightly stronger single-stat breaks for all four stats.</li>
<li>His ability awakenings make his single-stat breaks drastically stronger, making him a viable dedicated breaker.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Beach_Time_Fina"><a href="/Beach_Time_Fina" title="Beach Time Fina">Beach Time Fina</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-31" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-31" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Standard healer with a standard kit. Not awful, but nothing special, either.</li>
<li>Can provide a bit of AoE MP regeneration and aoe water resist.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Beatrix"><a href="/Beatrix" title="Beatrix">Beatrix</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-32" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-32" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent AoE breaker.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> family, but not while maintaining her best breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Belgemine"><a href="/Belgemine" title="Belgemine">Belgemine</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-33" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-33" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent magic fire/ice/lightning chainer.</li>
<li>Can fill the esper gauge.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Beowulf"><a href="/Beowulf" title="Beowulf">Beowulf</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-34" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-34" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent breaker with decent hybrid chaining capabilities.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Beryl"><a href="/Beryl" title="Beryl">Beryl</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-35" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-35" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent unit that can fill several roles.</li>
<li>Ideally used as either a tank who also chains, or as a chainer that also provides powerful breaks.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Black_Cat_Lid"><a href="/Black_Cat_Lid" title="Black Cat Lid">Black Cat Lid</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-36" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-36" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>A mediocre physical solo damage dealer.</li>
<li>Has killer effects that cause her to deal bonus damage to certain types of enemies, but she's very lackluster outside of those specialties.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Blossom_Sage_Sakura"><a href="/Blossom_Sage_Sakura" title="Blossom Sage Sakura">Blossom Sage Sakura</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-37" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-37" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Works very well as a solo damage dealer on fights where you can't fit two chainers into your team composition. It takes her a few turns to get going, but once Quick Final Thunder is stacked up, she hits hard.</li>
<li>She also brings some solid utility to the table. She can regenerate the team's MP, provide immunity to all status ailments, increase mitigation, and even buff a few elemental resists.</li>
<li>Her AoE damage via Quick Rebel Intention is okay but not amazing.</li>
<li>Her limit burst is a lot less useful than you'd think, since it takes so long to fill and only chains with a copy, and you'd rather run two chainers than two copies of her.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Bran"><a href="/Bran" title="Bran">Bran</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-38" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-38" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent physical lightning/light chainer and a competent mana battery.</li>
<li><a href="/Thunder_Clap" title="Thunder Clap">Thunder Clap</a> is Bran's chaining skill, dealing AoE Light and Lightning damage, while imperiling those two elements. The damage is fairly low by today's standards, but AoE physical chainers are relatively rare.</li>
<li><a href="/Elven_Song" title="Elven Song">Elven Song</a> provides AoE HP/MP regen.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Cagnazzo"><a href="/Cagnazzo" title="Cagnazzo">Cagnazzo</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-39" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-39" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Durable provoke tank who is good at his job and nothing else.</li>
<li>He can't take any other actions while provoking.</li>
<li>His equipment selection and stats aren't amazing, but the extremely high mitigation on his provoke makes up for it.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Camille"><a href="/Camille" title="Camille">Camille</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-40" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-40" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical chainer that can use water or earth.</li>
<li>She can chain with either Aileen or Tidus, both of whom are extremely powerful, making her a good budget option for players who don't have a good chainer of their own and want to pair up with a stronger friend.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Cecil"><a href="/Cecil" title="Cecil">Cecil</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-41" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-41" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical cover tank who can only protect one ally.</li>
<li>He's badly outdated and should not be used unless you're just starting out and lack better options.</li>
<li>Can also provide a bit of AoE healing.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Cedona"><a href="/Cedona" title="Cedona">Cedona</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-42" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-42" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical DPS with very poor damage output.</li>
<li>Has some weird counter abilities that might be useful if the proc chances weren't so low.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Cerius"><a href="/Cerius" title="Cerius">Cerius</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-43" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-43" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Can provide powerful increases to fire, ice, lightning, and dark resistance.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Charie"><a href="/Charie" title="Charie">Charie</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-44" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-44" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak support unit.</li>
<li>Can provide mediocre buffs to DEF/SPR via her LB, and has a bunch of other irrelevant skills.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Charlotte"><a href="/Charlotte" title="Charlotte">Charlotte</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-45" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-45" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Without her ability awakenings, Charlotte is an average physical-based cover tank with some additional utility (AoE MP regen), but her stats are a bit too low for her to safely soak up large amounts of damage.</li>
<li>Her enhancements aren't a massive upgrade, but they do slightly improve on every aspect of her.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Charming_Kitty_Ariana"><a href="/Charming_Kitty_Ariana" title="Charming Kitty Ariana">Charming Kitty Ariana</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-46" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-46" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent ability-based healer with built-in dualcast for most of her moves and lots of utility.</li>
<li>In addition to standard healer fare like AoE healing and ailment cures, she can provide reraise, break resistance, and elemental resistances.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Chic_Ariana"><a href="/Chic_Ariana" title="Chic Ariana">Chic Ariana</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-47" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-47" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak magic chainer.</li>
<li>Also has a couple of elemental skills that are even worse.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Chizuru"><a href="/Chizuru" title="Chizuru">Chizuru</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-48" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-48" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Dated AoE physical chainer.</li>
<li><a href="/Phantom_Shadow" title="Phantom Shadow">Phantom Shadow</a> is her best skill, but that's not saying much.</li>
<li>Ability awakened <a href="/Molt" title="Molt">Molt</a> gets her 2/5th of the way towards full evade.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Chloe"><a href="/Chloe" title="Chloe">Chloe</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-49" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-49" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Support unit that can provide 70% buffs to any elemental resistance.</li>
<li>Can also provide some damage boosts by imperiling enemies, granting magic killer effects to your other units, or breaking DEF/SPR.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Chow"><a href="/Chow" title="Chow">Chow</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-50" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-50" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent magic cover tank with amazing utility and great gear selection.</li>
<li>His LB is arguably the strongest skill in the game, combining powerful AoE mitigation with massive party-wide MP recovery.</li>
<li>Other useful abilities include AoE Stop and Charm immunity, powerful self healing + reraise, and Curaga.</li>
<li>Look at him. He is the best dog, and he deserves hugs and treats and love.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Christine"><a href="/Christine" title="Christine">Christine</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-51" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-51" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful ice magic chainer.</li>
<li>[[Absolute Zero] is her main chaining move. She can also use <a href="/Snow_Burial" title="Snow Burial">Snow Burial</a>, which chains with <a href="/Trance_Terra" title="Trance Terra">Trance Terra</a>'s <a href="/Chaos_Wave_Awakened" title="Chaos Wave Awakened">Chaos Wave Awakened</a>.</li>
<li>She can also create her own chaining partner by using <a href="/Hand_in_Hand" title="Hand in Hand">Hand in Hand</a> on an ally, but the damage is unimpressive.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Cid"><a href="/Cid" title="Cid">Cid</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-52" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-52" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical finisher.</li>
<li>Requires a setup turn in order to burst, and his damage isn't that high.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Circe"><a href="/Circe" title="Circe">Circe</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-53" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-53" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful water magic chainer with noticeable ramp-up time. She can also use wind/earth instead of water, but her damage drops drastically if you do so.</li>
<li>Her damage is very low until you use her limit burst, which unlocks several much stronger moves.</li>
<li>She relies heavily on gear and buffs to increase her limit gauge fill rate.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Citra"><a href="/Citra" title="Citra">Citra</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-54" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-54" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak magical light chainer with some support capabilities.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/index.php?title=Divine_Ruination_family&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Divine Ruination family (page does not exist)">Divine Ruination family</a>.</li>
<li>Her damage is terrible, but she can buff the party's magic mitigation, fill the esper gauge, and provide some extra healing.</li>
<li>Her evocation damage moves are also very weak.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Cloud"><a href="/Cloud" title="Cloud">Cloud</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-55" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-55" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical solo damage dealer, with the bulk of his damage output loaded into his LB.</li>
<li>Can also be used as a decent (but not great) chainer, but finding friend partners will be difficult.</li></ul>
<h4><span id="Cloud_(KH)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Cloud_.28KH.29"><a href="/Cloud_(KH)" title="Cloud (KH)">Cloud (KH)</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-56" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-56" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid physical chainer.</li>
<li>Has no imperils of his own, but pairs well with other <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> chainers that can imperil for him.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Cloud_of_Darkness"><a href="/Cloud_of_Darkness" title="Cloud of Darkness">Cloud of Darkness</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-57" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-57" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Dated physical damage dealer with some very weak ailment cure and elemental resistance skills.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Cor"><a href="/Cor" title="Cor">Cor</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-58" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-58" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar solo physical damage dealer.</li>
<li>Has a 40% ATK/MAG break, which could be decent for new players that don't yet have anything better.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Crimson"><a href="/Crimson" title="Crimson">Crimson</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-59" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-59" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid fire physical chainer.</li>
<li>Deals good AoE damage with his LB.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Crowe"><a href="/Crowe" title="Crowe">Crowe</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-60" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-60" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre support unit with a 30% mitigation buff.</li>
<li>Can grant single-target buffs of 100% to a single stat, provide a bit of healing, or use her LB to buff elemental resistances.</li>
<li>With her ability awakenings, she can also restore a small amount of MP to allies.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Cupid_Artemios"><a href="/Cupid_Artemios" title="Cupid Artemios">Cupid Artemios</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-61" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-61" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Prior to ability awakenings, is an awful unit that should not be used for any reason.</li>
<li>With awakened <a href="/Flash_Barrage" title="Flash Barrage">Flash Barrage</a>, he becomes a competent solo damage dealer.</li>
<li>Unfortunately, he has a passive that can cause him to suicide by covering female units, which is especially problematic if you're using a female tank like Mystea or Ozetta.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dangerous_Ariana"><a href="/Dangerous_Ariana" title="Dangerous Ariana">Dangerous Ariana</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-62" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-62" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak magic damage dealer with some equally weak stat buffs.</li>
<li>Can increase LB fill rate for the party.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dark_Fina"><a href="/Dark_Fina" title="Dark Fina">Dark Fina</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-63" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-63" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Without ability awakenings, she is a very weak solo magic damage dealer.</li>
<li>With ability awakenings, she's a weak magic chainer.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dark_Knight_Cecil"><a href="/Dark_Knight_Cecil" title="Dark Knight Cecil">Dark Knight Cecil</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-64" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-64" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Dark physical finisher.</li>
<li>Without ability awakenings, his skills are suicidal and deal very little damage. Do not use.</li>
<li>With ability awakenings, his skills do decent damage... but will still kill him.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dark_Knight_Luneth"><a href="/Dark_Knight_Luneth" title="Dark Knight Luneth">Dark Knight Luneth</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-65" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-65" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical finisher with extreme suicidal tendencies.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Delita"><a href="/Delita" title="Delita">Delita</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-66" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-66" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Without ability awakenings, he has absolutely no skills worth mentioning.</li>
<li>With ability awakenings, he can provide strong DEF/SPR breaks and minor AoE MP regen, but is still not worth using on harder encounters.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Demon_Rain"><a href="/Demon_Rain" title="Demon Rain">Demon Rain</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-67" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-67" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Without his ability awakenings, Demon Rain is terrible and should not be used.</li>
<li>With his ability awakenings, he has the ability to draw attacks and mitigate damage which, when coupled with his boosted enhanced passives, allow him to tank much more effectively.</li>
<li>His counters are even more effective with boosted attack passives and damage modifiers.</li>
<li>However, if you gear him for ATK, his survivability may suffer to the point that he'll have trouble surviving, so his counters are primarily useful for the LB and esper crystals they generate.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Desch"><a href="/Desch" title="Desch">Desch</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-68" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-68" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Support unit with not enough to offer.</li>
<li>Learns 4 different "Spark" skills which debuff two stats at a time, but the most useful combinations (ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR, available from other units) are glaringly missing. His atypical combos are slightly useful in specific trials, but are generally a lot worse.</li>
<li>With his ability awakenings, he can consistently imbue allies with lightning, but this is typically not useful enough to be worth bringing an otherwise useless team member.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Deuce"><a href="/Deuce" title="Deuce">Deuce</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-69" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-69" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid ability-based healer and buffer.</li>
<li>Her healing song provides significant healing and MP regen. After a couple of turns of ramp-up, it also buffs DEF/SPR by 100%.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dietlinde"><a href="/Dietlinde" title="Dietlinde">Dietlinde</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-70" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-70" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Passable physical chainer with <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a> frames.</li>
<li>Has a powerful 84% DEF break on her LB.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Divine_Soleil"><a href="/Divine_Soleil" title="Divine Soleil">Divine Soleil</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-71" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-71" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Serviceable ability-based healer.</li>
<li>Her actual healing output is lower than that of most other healers, but she can grant mitigation to specific units while healing, which helps to make up the difference if most of the damage is concentrated on a single unit (like a cover tank).</li>
<li>Has access to single-target reraise. Also, her LB grants a large stat buff to all allies and cures breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Doga"><a href="/Doga" title="Doga">Doga</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-72" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-72" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Earth magic chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Quake" title="Quake">Quake</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Drace"><a href="/Drace" title="Drace">Drace</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-73" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-73" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak support unit with a couple of stat buffs and minor MP restoration.</li>
<li>Can cure Stop.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dracu_Lasswell"><a href="/Dracu_Lasswell" title="Dracu Lasswell">Dracu Lasswell</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-74" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-74" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Awful damage dealer both before and after his ability awakenings. Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dragonlord"><a href="/Dragonlord" title="Dragonlord">Dragonlord</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-75" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-75" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Magical damage dealer with the hardest hitting on-demand ability in the game.</li>
<li>Burns through insane amounts of MP (150 per turn), which makes him extremely difficult to use on any fight that lasts more than a couple of turns.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Duke"><a href="/Duke" title="Duke">Duke</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-76" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-76" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak ice physical chainer.</li>
<li>On top of his mediocre modifier, his chains will always break before the last hit, which limits his damage even further.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Eiko"><a href="/Eiko" title="Eiko">Eiko</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-77" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-77" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent healer and summoner with innate dualcast.</li>
<li>Can both heal and fill the summon gauge at the same time, or provide an LB fill rate buff and fill the esper gauge simultaneously.</li>
<li>Can AoE cure stat breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Elbis"><a href="/Elbis" title="Elbis">Elbis</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-78" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-78" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible physical fire solo damage dealer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Elephim"><a href="/Elephim" title="Elephim">Elephim</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-79" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-79" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent support unit that can buff and break.</li>
<li>Unfortunately, her on-demand breaks are single-stat.</li>
<li>Her LB provides massive full breaks, but will take quite a while to fill.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Elfreeda"><a href="/Elfreeda" title="Elfreeda">Elfreeda</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-80" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-80" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>A mix between a breaker, provoke tank and counter-based DPS. Unfortunately, she does not excel at any of those roles.</li>
<li>The lack of mitigation on her provoke means that she'll typically die to harder-hitting bosses unless she is <i>extremely</i> well geared, and even that may not be enough.</li>
<li>Her ST breaks provide a dispel and are serviceable at best, but due to the low turn duration on her provoke skills she won't have that many turns to use them. Clever Smile has special mention here as it breaks both offensive stats while also having a provoke attached to it, rendering most of her other breaks null.</li>
<li>Note that the dispel attached to her single-stat breaks will dispel other breaks, which typically means that they're a very bad idea unless you have another unit to reapply an ATK/MAG break.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ellesperis"><a href="/Ellesperis" title="Ellesperis">Ellesperis</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-81" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-81" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent physical chainer with suicidal tendencies.</li>
<li>The HP costs on her abilities can make it troublesome to keep her alive, since you often need to heal her both before and after she attacks.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Elly"><a href="/Elly" title="Elly">Elly</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-82" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-82" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar magic chainer with low damage output and no chaining partners.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Elza"><a href="/Elza" title="Elza">Elza</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-83" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-83" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solo damage dealer/breaker.</li>
<li>Prior to ability awakenings, she's extremely weak. Even with her awakenings, though, her damage is relatively unimpressive.</li>
<li>Has good DEF/SPR breaks, but they are probably not worth the cost to awaken them.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Emeralda"><a href="/Emeralda" title="Emeralda">Emeralda</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-84" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-84" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Water/wind magic chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a> and <a href="/Flood" title="Flood">Flood</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Emilia"><a href="/Emilia" title="Emilia">Emilia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-85" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-85" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak physical chainer with innate dual wield for daggers.</li>
<li>Her modifiers are low, but she can chain with Onion Knight's Splendors or Onion Slice abilities. Unfortunately, this attack is locked behind a setup move.</li></ul>
