<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Emperor"><a href="/Emperor" title="Emperor">Emperor</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-86" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-86" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solo fire magical damage dealer who takes many turns to get going, but deals very high damage once he gets there.</li>
<li><a href="/Fire_From_Below" title="Fire From Below">Fire From Below</a> increases in damage with each use up to a cap, reaching its maximum potential after nine uses.</li>
<li><a href="/Control" title="Control">Control</a> is a massive MAG buff and SPR break, but also reduces the SPR of your own units, which may get them killed if you don't have a way to deal with it.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Emperor_Shera"><a href="/Emperor_Shera" title="Emperor Shera">Emperor Shera</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-87" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-87" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent fire physical chainer.</li>
<li>Has AoE break resistance and a decent DEF/SPR buff with attached fire resistance.</li>
<li>Finding friends to chain with will be extremely difficult.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Estark"><a href="/Estark" title="Estark">Estark</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-88" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-88" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent physical chainer with innate wield.</li>
<li>Can chain with <a href="/Orlandu" class="mw-redirect" title="Orlandu">Orlandu</a>'s <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a>, and similar attacks.</li>
<li>Has a 60% ATK break.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Eve"><a href="/Eve" title="Eve">Eve</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-89" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-89" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Like his brother Adam, Eve has various skills that help him to survive damage, but nothing that lets him actually protect his party.</li>
<li>He's awful. Don't use him.</li>
<li>Those abs, though.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Exdeath"><a href="/Exdeath" title="Exdeath">Exdeath</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-90" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-90" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak mage with bad skills, terrible gear selection, and poor base stats.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Explorer_Aileen"><a href="/Explorer_Aileen" title="Explorer Aileen">Explorer Aileen</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-91" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-91" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Great physical chainer. She's best off using earth weapons so that she can elemental chain with regular Aileen and take advantage of her imperil. Unless you have TDH gear, give her dual wield, rather than using her innate doublehand.</li>
<li>She's a walking chainer, which means that her chains may break on some enemies depending on where the game has them positioned.</li>
<li>Has excellent utility in the form of a 50% ATK/MAG break.</li>
<li>Can chain with Aileen, Camille, and Lara Croft.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fayt"><a href="/Fayt" title="Fayt">Fayt</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-92" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-92" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical chainer with great elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>He can imbue himself with several different elements, and imperils every element with his LB.</li>
<li>However, his chains always break, which severely hampers his damage output.</li>
<li>Can also function as a competent solo damage dealer with <a href="/Blade_of_Fury" title="Blade of Fury">Blade of Fury</a>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fei"><a href="/Fei" title="Fei">Fei</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-93" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-93" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical chainer who is not part of any chaining families and lacks any decent 7* chaining partners.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Felix"><a href="/Felix" title="Felix">Felix</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-94" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-94" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre earth/fire hybrid chainer.</li>
<li>Has good damage for a 6* unit, but chains very poorly with anyone other than a dupe. Not even a 7* copy of him will make a good partner.</li>
<li>Has a strong 60% ATK/MAG break on his LB.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fidel"><a href="/Fidel" title="Fidel">Fidel</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-95" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-95" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer.</li>
<li>Only really notable for chaining with <a href="/Fayt" title="Fayt">Fayt</a>, but the chains will always break.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fina"><a href="/Fina" title="Fina">Fina</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-96" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-96" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>For a starting healer she is quite serviceable with Curaga, Raise and Superior Healing (which can cleanse most ailments). She can provide additional utility with Entrust.</li>
<li>She can equip her exclusive equipment which provide decent stats, but more importantly a steady source of MP regeneration.</li>
<li>Her enhancements aren't particularly necessary, and it may be better not to spend the crysts and gil on such minor upgrades.</li>
<li>As you begin to move into endgame content, she falls off in effectiveness, and you'll want to look for other, better healers.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Firion"><a href="/Firion" title="Firion">Firion</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-97" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-97" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Dated solo physical damage dealer.</li>
<li>Without his ability awakenings, his damage is awful.</li>
<li>With them, it's something approaching usable against the enemy types he has killer passives for, but is still not great.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fohlen"><a href="/Fohlen" title="Fohlen">Fohlen</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-98" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-98" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mid-tier physical wind chainer.</li>
<li>Gets Mirage (physical evasion) as a bonus from his chaining move.</li>
<li>Finding chaining partners will be difficult.</li>
<li>Can reduce encounter rate in exploration missions.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Folka"><a href="/Folka" title="Folka">Folka</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-99" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-99" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Incredibly powerful healer with excellent support capabilities.</li>
<li>Has Curaja and Reraise.</li>
<li>Can provide break immunity, ailment immunity, stop immunity, and charm immunity.</li>
<li>Can restore the party's MP.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Franis"><a href="/Franis" title="Franis">Franis</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-100" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-100" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak chainer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span id="Freya_(VP)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Freya_.28VP.29"><a href="/Freya_(VP)" title="Freya (VP)">Freya (VP)</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-101" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-101" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent magic chainer.</li>
<li>Burns through MP very quickly.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fryevia"><a href="/Fryevia" title="Fryevia">Fryevia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-102" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-102" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Hybrid ice chainer able to reach high MAG and deal excellent damage.</li>
<li>Despite her innate Doublehand effect, she's better off being built for <a href="/Dual_Wield" title="Dual Wield">dual wield</a> with an emphasis on the MAG stat.</li>
<li>Her frames change with her enhancements. With <a href="/Frost_Flower_Blitz" title="Frost Flower Blitz">Frost Flower Blitz</a> +2, she chains perfectly with <a href="/Orlandeau" title="Orlandeau">Orlandeau</a> and the rest of the DR family.</li>
<li>Is locked into dealing ice damage, which can cause problems against ice immune bosses.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Gaffgarion"><a href="/Gaffgarion" title="Gaffgarion">Gaffgarion</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-103" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-103" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Without ability awakenings, he is a poor dark attacker with suicidal skills. Do not use.</li>
<li>His ability awakenings increase his damage somewhat, but not by enough to make him worthwhile.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Garland"><a href="/Garland" title="Garland">Garland</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-104" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-104" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Awful damage dealer both before and after his ability awakenings.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Garnet"><a href="/Garnet" title="Garnet">Garnet</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-105" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-105" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Prior to enhancements, she's an average healer/summoner combo. She has access to the basic Curaga and Raise. She does extra damage when evoking espers, which can help to one-shot bosses from certain thresholds when used to cap a chain.</li>
<li>Prayer to the Eidolons and her LB (coupled with her innate High Tide) allow her to build the esper gauge quickly (and without your units needing to attack).</li>
<li>After enhancements her Raise turns into a Full-Life (essentially) and her Curaga receives a slight boost in effectiveness. Her summoning damage is also boosted considerably.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Gilbert"><a href="/Gilbert" title="Gilbert">Gilbert</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-106" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-106" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre buffer/MP battery.</li>
<li>Requires his ability awakenings to be good-- without them, he is trash tier.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Gilgamesh"><a href="/Gilgamesh" title="Gilgamesh">Gilgamesh</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-107" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-107" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Without ability awakenings, he is a poor physical chainer.</li>
<li>His ability awakenings significantly improve his ATK and damage, but his damage is still subpar at best.</li>
<li>Finding chaining partners will be nigh-impossible.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Gladiolus"><a href="/Gladiolus" title="Gladiolus">Gladiolus</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-108" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-108" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Gladiolus is a physical cover tank.</li>
<li>Unfortunately, he has no utility, and the 3* and 4* physical cover tanks are usually a better option.</li>
<li>He does have some damaging moves, but if you gear him for ATK, he has trouble surviving, and if you gear him for survivability, his damage will be awful.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Glauca"><a href="/Glauca" title="Glauca">Glauca</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-109" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-109" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak dark/light physical chainer.</li>
<li><a href="/Daybreak_Darkness" title="Daybreak Darkness">Daybreak Darkness</a> can chain imperfectly with Knight Delita.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Goken"><a href="/Goken" title="Goken">Goken</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-110" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-110" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer.</li>
<li>However, he is one of the very few physical units that can AoE chain.</li>
<li>Several of his skills allow him to chain with other units-- for instance, <a href="/Falcon_Kick" title="Falcon Kick">Falcon Kick</a> can chain with <a href="/Sephiroth" title="Sephiroth">Sephiroth</a>'s <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a>. However, these skills require you to take time to unlock them for a single use, and this makes him a poor chaining partner.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Grace"><a href="/Grace" title="Grace">Grace</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-111" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-111" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Prior to her ability awakenings, she is a literal suicide bomber who can blow herself up to deal mediocre damage.</li>
<li>With her ability awakenings, she can instead use <a href="/Destroy_Arm" title="Destroy Arm">Destroy Arm</a> to deal similar damage without dying.</li>
<li>However, her low stats means that she's still fairly weak.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Grim_Lord_Sakura"><a href="/Grim_Lord_Sakura" title="Grim Lord Sakura">Grim Lord Sakura</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-112" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-112" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good magical chainer requiring her own TMR to optimize MAG and HP. Can use either nonelemental abilities or a dark/fire mix.</li>
<li>Has some good utility. AoE break immunity, several elemental resist buffs, a DEF/SPR buff, single-target reraise, and a handful of AoE ailment immunities.</li>
<li>She burns through quite a bit of MP, and may have trouble on longer turns. She has the ability to kill your own party members to restore her MP, but that's quite a downside.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Grinfield"><a href="/Grinfield" title="Grinfield">Grinfield</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-113" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-113" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely weak physical/hybrid chainer.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Hayate"><a href="/Hayate" title="Hayate">Hayate</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-114" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-114" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very poor solo hybrid damage dealer, both before and after his ability awakenings. Do not use.</li>
<li>Can reduce encounter rate in exploration missions.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Heavenly_Technician_Lid"><a href="/Heavenly_Technician_Lid" title="Heavenly Technician Lid">Heavenly Technician Lid</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-115" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-115" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful support unit with very strong breaks.</li>
<li><a href="/Arms_Dissolver" title="Arms Dissolver">Arms Dissolver</a>, <a href="/Magic_Absorb" title="Magic Absorb">Magic Absorb</a>, and <a href="/Attack_Absorb" title="Attack Absorb">Attack Absorb</a> will drastically reduce enemy damage. Her limit burst is even stronger, cutting enemy damage by 91%.</li>
<li>She can also provide AoE MP regen and (somewhat unreliable) 30% mitigation.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Helena"><a href="/Helena" title="Helena">Helena</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-116" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-116" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical solo damage dealer with poor stats and even worse modifiers.</li>
<li>Has innate dual wield, but only for guns, daggers, whips, and throwing weapons-- none of which have high ATK in the first place.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Heltich"><a href="/Heltich" title="Heltich">Heltich</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-117" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-117" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar magical chainer or awful solo damage dealer.</li>
<li><a href="/Liberation" title="Liberation">Liberation</a> is likely to get him killed, so don't use it.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="High_Seraph_Ultima"><a href="/High_Seraph_Ultima" title="High Seraph Ultima">High Seraph Ultima</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-118" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-118" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Non-elemental magic chainer.</li>
<li>Personal damage is unimpressive, but she can unlock quad-cast and chain well with certain 7* units.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> and <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Hyoh"><a href="/Hyoh" title="Hyoh">Hyoh</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-119" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-119" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Strong fire/lightning physical chainer.</li>
<li>His damage will skyrocket if you have access to True Doublehand gear, putting him on par with some 7* units. Without that gear, though, dual wield may be preferable-- it does very slightly less damage, but cuts his MP consumption in half.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ignacio"><a href="/Ignacio" title="Ignacio">Ignacio</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-120" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-120" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent finisher with some support capabilities.</li>
<li>Can imbue other units with fire.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ignis"><a href="/Ignis" title="Ignis">Ignis</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-121" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-121" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good buffer who requires setup turns.</li>
<li>His clunky rotation can be a serious problem on many fights, especially if units are dying, but if you can work around it, he gets the job done.</li>
<li>Consider using <a href="/Cradle_of_Horns" title="Cradle of Horns">Cradle of Horns</a> for buffing on turn 1 before his buffs are set up.</li>
<li>Can imbue allies with certain elements.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ilias"><a href="/Ilias" title="Ilias">Ilias</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-122" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-122" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Support unit that covers several uncommon niches.</li>
<li>Capable of using any item (most notably <a href="/Elixir" title="Elixir">Elixir</a>) on the whole party.</li>
<li>Can make allies fully immune to ailments via <a href="/Immunization" title="Immunization">Immunization</a>, provide break immunity, restore MP, cure ailments, and buff DEF/SPR.</li>
<li>However, most of his skills must be unlocked by using another skill first, and many of them only last for one turn.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Illusionist_Nichol"><a href="/Illusionist_Nichol" title="Illusionist Nichol">Illusionist Nichol</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-123" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-123" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Unique support unit able to turn any ally into an AoE physical cover tank.</li>
<li>Can break ATK/MAG by 45% (50% with ability awakenings).</li>
<li>He works best with provoke tanks and particularly durable non-tank units, such as <a href="/Zargabaath" title="Zargabaath">Zargabaath</a>.</li>
<li>He can dualcast most of his abilities.</li>
<li>His LB grants AoE mirage, as well as HP and MP regen over 3 turns.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Iris"><a href="/Iris" title="Iris">Iris</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-124" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-124" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent ability-based healer.</li>
<li>Her actual skills are pretty good, but she periodically has to spend a turn to unlock the ability to dualcast them, and taking a turn off from healing can get your units killed.</li>
<li>MP costs are quite high, causing her to run dry very quickly.</li>
<li>Can restore the MP of allies.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Jecht"><a href="/Jecht" title="Jecht">Jecht</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-125" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-125" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful water physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Quick_Hit" title="Quick Hit">Quick Hit</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Jiraiya"><a href="/Jiraiya" title="Jiraiya">Jiraiya</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-126" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-126" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre hybrid fire/lightning hybrid chainer.</li>
<li>After setup, can chain with the <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> and <a href="/Kingsglaive" title="Kingsglaive">Kingsglaive</a> families.</li>
<li>Can AoE buff elemental resistances and provide mirage.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Joachim"><a href="/Joachim" title="Joachim">Joachim</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-127" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-127" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Great buffer who relies heavily on his LB.</li>
<li>Once it's up, he provides 124% DEF/SPR, 30% mitigation, and HP/MP regen.</li>
<li>His non-LB skills are a lot less useful.</li>
<li>Consider giving him <a href="/Cradle_of_Horns" title="Cradle of Horns">Cradle of Horns</a> for turn 1 buffing. Items that help him to fill his LB more quickly are also a good choice.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kaede"><a href="/Kaede" title="Kaede">Kaede</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-128" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-128" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer.</li>
<li>Has a slight amount of utility. Minor ATK/MAG buff and very minor LB fill rate buff.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kaliva"><a href="/Kaliva" title="Kaliva">Kaliva</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-129" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-129" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Prior to his ability awakenings, he is basically unusable.</li>
<li>With his ability awakenings, his damage is still unimpressive. His healer skills are even worse.</li>
<li>Has a good water/ice imperil.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Karlette"><a href="/Karlette" title="Karlette">Karlette</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-130" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-130" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid hybrid chainer with elemental flexiblity and support capabilities.</li>
<li>Can buff elemental resistances and mitigation.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Quick_Hit" title="Quick Hit">Quick Hit</a> and <a href="/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kefka"><a href="/Kefka" title="Kefka">Kefka</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-131" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-131" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mage with very low damage.</li>
<li>Can escape from battles, so that you can go replace him with a better unit.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kelsus"><a href="/Kelsus" title="Kelsus">Kelsus</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-132" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-132" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak delayed physical chainer.</li>
<li>Has innate dual wield for fists only.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kihana"><a href="/Kihana" title="Kihana">Kihana</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-133" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-133" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak support unit.</li>
<li>Has access to some powerful breaks and buffs, but they are locked behind multiple turns of setup, making her borderline unusable.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Killian"><a href="/Killian" title="Killian">Killian</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-134" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-134" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical fire solo damage dealer with poor output.</li>
<li>Relies on unlocking the ability to quadruple-cast his abilities, but his modifiers are low enough that his damage is still unimpressive.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="King"><a href="/King" title="King">King</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-135" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-135" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Absolutely awful solo physical damage dealer who focuses on using his basic attack.</li>
<li>Output is very, very low and his attacks take forever.</li>
<li>Has innate dual wield for guns only.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Knight_Delita"><a href="/Knight_Delita" title="Knight Delita">Knight Delita</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-136" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-136" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Without ability awakenings, a mediocre damage dealer. With them, he's an excellent physical lightning chainer.</li>
<li>His limit burst is one of the strongest ATK/MAG breaks in the game and will drastically reduce the damage of bosses who are not immune to it. He also has a much weaker on-demand break for those two stats.</li>
<li>He gets a massive amount of&#160;%ATK from his passives post-enhancements, which makes him quite strong even with minimal gear.</li>
<li>Is locked into dealing lightning damage.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kryla"><a href="/Kryla" title="Kryla">Kryla</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-137" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-137" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid support unit with 50% breaks and imperils. With her ability awakenings, those breaks go up to a whopping 65%.</li>
<li>She can dualcast almost all of her abilities.</li>
<li>Can AoE dispel all allies and enemies, and deal fixed damage.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kuja"><a href="/Kuja" title="Kuja">Kuja</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-138" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-138" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar magic lightning solo damage dealer. Requires his ability awakenings.</li>
<li>Can buff lightning resistance for the party by 100%.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kurasame"><a href="/Kurasame" title="Kurasame">Kurasame</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-139" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-139" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very strong hybrid ice chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Quick_Hit" title="Quick Hit">Quick Hit</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kunshira"><a href="/Kunshira" title="Kunshira">Kunshira</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-140" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-140" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre hybrid chainer with lots of elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Has innate dual wield for swords and rods.</li>
<li>Can buff various elemental resistances.</li>
<li>Finding friends to chain with will be nearly impossible.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kupipi"><a href="/Kupipi" title="Kupipi">Kupipi</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-141" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-141" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mid-tier healer with innate dualcast.</li>
<li>Can buff DEF/SPR by 109% via her LB.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kupolkan"><a href="/Kupolkan" title="Kupolkan">Kupolkan</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-142" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-142" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak support unit that can buff elemental resistances.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kyanos"><a href="/Kyanos" title="Kyanos">Kyanos</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-143" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-143" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lara_Croft"><a href="/Lara_Croft" title="Lara Croft">Lara Croft</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-144" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-144" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical chainer with low modifiers.</li>
<li>Can chain with enhanced Aileen and Explorer Aileen, making her a decent budget partner.</li>
<li>Has innate dual wield for daggers, whips, throwing weapons, and guns.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lasswell"><a href="/Lasswell" title="Lasswell">Lasswell</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-145" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-145" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><i>Extremely</i> weak physical damage dealer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lenneth"><a href="/Lenneth" title="Lenneth">Lenneth</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-146" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-146" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre dark physical chainer.</li>
<li>Burns through MP very quickly.</li>
<li>Can somewhat chain with the <a href="/Piledriver" title="Piledriver">Piledriver</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Leopold"><a href="/Leopold" title="Leopold">Leopold</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-147" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-147" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent physical tank.</li>
<li>Can AoE buff mitigation by 42% for three turns via his LB.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Piledriver" title="Piledriver">Piledriver</a> family, but as he is a tank, you likely don't want to give him dual wield, which limits his partners.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lexa"><a href="/Lexa" title="Lexa">Lexa</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-148" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-148" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid magic wind chainer with <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a> and <a href="/Aeroja" title="Aeroja">Aeroja</a>.</li>
<li>Has innate dualcast.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Libertus"><a href="/Libertus" title="Libertus">Libertus</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-149" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-149" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent physical cover tank who typically requires a setup turn.</li>
<li>His cover is extremely weak unless you use his provoke the turn before.</li>
<li>Can AoE buff mitigation by 30%.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lightning"><a href="/Lightning" title="Lightning">Lightning</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-150" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-150" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible physical damage dealer, both before and after her ability awakenings.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lila"><a href="/Lila" title="Lila">Lila</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-151" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-151" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical damage dealer with unusual mechanics.</li>
<li>Her strongest skills scale off of SPR rather than ATK, and she should be built accordingly.</li>
<li>Can imbue and imperil several different elements, and triplecast her abilities after a setup move.</li>
<li>Has a decent AoE chaining move.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lilith"><a href="/Lilith" title="Lilith">Lilith</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-152" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-152" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good physical/magic cover tank.</li>
<li>She's better at covering magic than physical, due to her lower DEF.</li>
<li>Can grant AoE break immunity and chain with the <a href="/Kingsglaive" title="Kingsglaive">Kingsglaive</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ling"><a href="/Ling" title="Ling">Ling</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-153" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-153" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent support unit with a versatile kit.</li>
<li>Can break ATK/MAG (45%), restore MP to allies, cure ailments, raise dead allies, and use <a href="/Entrust" title="Entrust">Entrust</a>.</li>
<li>With her ability awakenings, she also gains the ability to buff mitigation and elemental resists after setup.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Livid_Shantotto"><a href="/Livid_Shantotto" title="Livid Shantotto">Livid Shantotto</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-154" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-154" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak magic solo damage dealer and an even worse chainer.</li>
<li>Her chaining moves all cost LB crystals, which she can't generate without using them in the first place, and her stacking abilities are lackluster.</li>
<li>Her HP is alarmingly low, sitting at around 3k in BiS gear, which means that she dies to almost anything that hits her.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Loren"><a href="/Loren" title="Loren">Loren</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-155" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-155" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical lightning/wind chainer with innate dual-wield and good utility, but mediocre damage.</li>
<li>Her strongest attacks are locked behind a setup.</li>
<li>Can break ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR by 45%. Her ability awakenings increase this to 50%.</li>
<li>Finding chaining partners will be difficult.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lotus_Mage_Fina"><a href="/Lotus_Mage_Fina" title="Lotus Mage Fina">Lotus Mage Fina</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-156" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-156" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent healer with access to Curaja, Esunaga, Full Life, and Dispelga, allowing her to handle all of the standard healing duties. She is also one of the few units with Reraise, which can be dualcast alongside her other spells.</li>
<li>Also has great utility. She can restore the party's MP, provide AoE reraise with her limit burst, and buff all elemental resists.</li>
<li>Has some very limited damage potential which she could use on turns when you don't need as much healing, although this is typically not significant or worthwhile.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lucian"><a href="/Lucian" title="Lucian">Lucian</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-157" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-157" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lucius"><a href="/Lucius" title="Lucius">Lucius</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-158" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-158" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Kingsglaive" title="Kingsglaive">Kingsglaive</a> and <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> families.</li>
<li>Has innate dual wield.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Luka"><a href="/Luka" title="Luka">Luka</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-159" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-159" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent ability-based healer. Requires ability awakenings to be worth using.</li>
<li>Has a powerful 20-turn heal over time effect, and can heal and cure ailments at the same time.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lulu"><a href="/Lulu" title="Lulu">Lulu</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-160" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-160" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent AoE magic water/lightning chainer.</li>
<li>Has innate dualcast.</li>
<li>Her damage is heavily reliant on her counter imperil proccing, which makes her inconsistent.</li>
<li>Finding chaining partners will be very difficult.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lunera"><a href="/Lunera" title="Lunera">Lunera</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-161" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-161" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Requires her ability awakenings.</li>
<li><a href="/Elven_Song_(Lunera)" title="Elven Song (Lunera)">Elven Song</a> turns her into a good support unit, capable of providing powerful stat buffs and massive HP/MP recovery.</li>
<li>She also has a few offensive skills, including a chaining move, but their damage is very low.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Luneth"><a href="/Luneth" title="Luneth">Luneth</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-162" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-162" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre solo physical damage dealer.</li>
<li>Requires ability awakenings to deal decent damage.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Machina"><a href="/Machina" title="Machina">Machina</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-163" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-163" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Amazing support unit with extremely powerful breaks.</li>
<li>Can break ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR by 70% on-demand, although this only lasts for one turn and will decay into weaker breaks over the next several turns.</li>
<li>His LB breaks ATK/MAG by a massive 74%.</li>
<li>Can AoE buff physical/magical mitigation and provide SPR break immunity.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Macmedi"><a href="/Macmedi" title="Macmedi">Macmedi</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-164" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-164" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak physical chainer with some minor support capabilities.</li>
<li>Can grant immunity to ailments and has a 45% full break.</li>
<li>Has an attack with <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a> frames, but it's a walking chain, so it will break with dual wield.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Magna"><a href="/Magna" title="Magna">Magna</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-165" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-165" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent magic light chainer.</li>
<li>Requires a turn of setup if he wants to dualcast his chaining move.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Malphasie"><a href="/Malphasie" title="Malphasie">Malphasie</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-166" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-166" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely powerful dark or wind hybrid chainer with powerful counter breaks.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family and the <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a> family.</li>
<li>Has a chance to counter attacks with a 60% ATK/MAG break, drastically reducing enemy damage output.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Marie"><a href="/Marie" title="Marie">Marie</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-167" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-167" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Specialized support unit that excels at her niche.</li>
<li>Has innate dual cast.</li>
<li>Can provide powerful elemental resistance buffs.</li>
<li>With ability awakenings, can grant ailment immunity and AoE healing.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Mario_Frigo"><a href="/Mario_Frigo" title="Mario Frigo">Mario Frigo</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-168" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-168" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer.</li>
<li>His primary attack has the same frames as <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a>, giving him several possible chaining partners.</li>
<li>Can break ATK by 45% and buff LB fill rate by 100%.</li>
<li>In the absence of TDH TMs, he should be built for dual wield, not Doublehand.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Maritime_Strategist_Nichol"><a href="/Maritime_Strategist_Nichol" title="Maritime Strategist Nichol">Maritime Strategist Nichol</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-169" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-169" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely powerful support unit with access to a wide range of potent abilities.</li>
<li>Can massively buff all stats, regenerate HP/MP for the party, provide mitigation, buff elemental resistances, and cure breaks. Almost all of his abilities can be dualcast via <a href="/Linked_Stance" title="Linked Stance">Linked Stance</a>.</li>
<li>Burns through a lot of MP, so try to give him gear that will help to sustain his usage.</li></ul>
<h4><span id="Marquis_de_Léon"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Marquis_de_L.C3.A9on"><a href="/Marquis_de_L%C3%A9on" title="Marquis de Léon">Marquis de Léon</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-170" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-170" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible damage dealer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Maxwell"><a href="/Maxwell" title="Maxwell">Maxwell</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-171" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-171" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak physical damage dealer.</li>
<li>Can hypothetically form long chains with her LB, but finding a chaining partner will be absolutely impossible.</li>
<li>Can apply a self-reraise effect.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Mediena"><a href="/Mediena" title="Mediena">Mediena</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-172" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-172" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful ice AoE magic chainer.</li>
<li>Has significant ramp-up time and no utility to speak of, but once she gets going, her damage output is absurd.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Medius"><a href="/Medius" title="Medius">Medius</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-173" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-173" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely weak physical chainer with a death wish.</li>
<li>His damage is terrible, and his innate <a href="/Draw_Attacks" title="Draw Attacks">Draw Attacks</a> will frequently get him killed.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Melete"><a href="/Melete" title="Melete">Melete</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-174" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-174" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Support unit that can buff elemental resistances.</li>
<li>Can also provide some low-grade stat buffs and HP/MP regen.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Meliadoul"><a href="/Meliadoul" title="Meliadoul">Meliadoul</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-175" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-175" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre support unit who becomes significantly better after her ability awakenings.</li>
<li>Has slightly subpar breaks (40%) and can provide single-target reraise.</li>
<li>Her ability awakenings bring her breaks up to 50%, which is a significant upgrade. She still doesn't have a ton of versatility, however.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Mercedes"><a href="/Mercedes" title="Mercedes">Mercedes</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-176" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-176" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak water physical solo damage dealer.</li>
<li>Has a large water imperil.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Mercenary_Ramza"><a href="/Mercenary_Ramza" title="Mercenary Ramza">Mercenary Ramza</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-177" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-177" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Prior to ability awakenings, he is a terrible excuse for a damage dealer.</li>
<li>With his ability awakenings, he becomes an extremely powerful provoke tank with immunity to all ailments and excellent utility.</li>
<li>He can break ATK and MAG by 45% with Blade of Justice, which then unlocks even stronger 60% breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Minfilia"><a href="/Minfilia" title="Minfilia">Minfilia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-178" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-178" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Support unit that can buff any elemental resistance and provide decent stat buffs.</li>
<li>Also has access to AoE immunity buffs for Stop and certain ailments.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Miyuki"><a href="/Miyuki" title="Miyuki">Miyuki</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-179" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-179" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Hybrid chainer with poor equipment selection and very, very weak damage output.</li>
<li>Has innate dual wield for katanas, daggers, and throwing weapons.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Moogle"><a href="/Moogle" title="Moogle">Moogle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-180" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-180" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>With ability awakenings, Mog Barrage +2 can chain perfectly with Tidus. Also, he can imbue his attacks with almost any element.</li>
<li>Can provide AoE stop immunity.</li>
<li>Unfortunately, his stats are low and Camille is a better and more accessible budget partner for Tidus.</li></ul>
