<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Myra"><a href="/Myra" title="Myra">Myra</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-181" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-181" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent healer that can provide DEF/SPR break immunity.</li>
<li>Has Curaja and Reraise.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Mystea"><a href="/Mystea" title="Mystea">Mystea</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-182" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-182" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Magic cover tank with excellent utility.</li>
<li>Has limited equipment selection and mediocre base stats, which can leave her a bit squishy.</li>
<li>Can provide AoE resistance to ailments and stop, as well as 42% mitigation.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Nagflar"><a href="/Nagflar" title="Nagflar">Nagflar</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-183" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-183" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer with versatile yet weak support capabilities.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Piledriver" title="Piledriver">Piledriver</a> family, fill the esper gauge, fill the LB gauge, and buff physical/magical mitigation for individual allies.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Nalu"><a href="/Nalu" title="Nalu">Nalu</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-184" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-184" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical lightning chainer with good damage output.</li>
<li>Has QH frames, allowing her to chain with Tidus and other units in that chaining family.</li>
<li>Is best built using true doublehand effects such as her own TM, even if that is your only source of TDH.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Nameless_Gunner_Jake"><a href="/Nameless_Gunner_Jake" title="Nameless Gunner Jake">Nameless Gunner Jake</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-185" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-185" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak physical chainer with elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>His strongest moves require an unlock and their damage is subpar even then.</li>
<li>Has 45% breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Nine"><a href="/Nine" title="Nine">Nine</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-186" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-186" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible solo physical damage dealer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noctis"><a href="/Noctis" title="Noctis">Noctis</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-187" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-187" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>He can do a lot of different things, but isn't very good at most of them.</li>
<li>His damage is third-rate at best, his breaks are split the wrong way, and there are better options for buffers and evasion tanks.</li>
<li>He sees the most use as an alternative to Soleil, providing stat buffs via his LB. Unfortunately, this requires enhancements, at least a turn of ramp-up, and maxing his LB.</li>
<li>Most suited for arena.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Nyalu"><a href="/Nyalu" title="Nyalu">Nyalu</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-188" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-188" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak support unit/healer.</li>
<li>Has AoE heals and 40% ATK/MAG breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Nyx"><a href="/Nyx" title="Nyx">Nyx</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-189" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-189" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent fire physical chainer who is hampered by his limited equipment selection.</li>
<li>Has 45% dual-stat breaks, but they're split the wrong way and are thus largely pointless. These become 50% breaks with his ability awakenings.</li>
<li>Innate dual wield.</li>
<li>His ability awakenings increase his damage significantly, but his damage is still lackluster compared to the competition.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ohga"><a href="/Ohga" title="Ohga">Ohga</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-190" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-190" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Provoke and physical cover tank (with ability awakenings).</li>
<li>Has terrible stats that will cause him to die very easily.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Olif"><a href="/Olif" title="Olif">Olif</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-191" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-191" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid support unit.</li>
<li>Can buff elemental resistances, mitigation, and provide MP regen.</li>
<li>Also has some weak stat buffs and killer buffs.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Olive"><a href="/Olive" title="Olive">Olive</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-192" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-192" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical lightning solo damage dealer with high output.</li>
<li>Has a powerful lightning imperil and DEF break.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Onion_Knight"><a href="/Onion_Knight" title="Onion Knight">Onion Knight</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-193" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-193" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent physical chainer with elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Innate dual wield.</li>
<li><a href="/Onion_Cutter" title="Onion Cutter">Onion Cutter</a>, unlocked via equipping his TM, is his strongest skill.</li>
<li>Has an extremely powerful DEF break (74%) attached to his LB.</li>
<li>His ability awakenings significantly increase his damage and allow him to imperil and imbue four different elements.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Onion_Knight_Refia"><a href="/Onion_Knight_Refia" title="Onion Knight Refia">Onion Knight Refia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-194" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-194" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent physical chainer with elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Innate dual wield.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a> family, but not very well due to requiring repeated unlocks for that skill.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Orlandeau"><a href="/Orlandeau" title="Orlandeau">Orlandeau</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-195" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-195" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent light physical chainer.</li>
<li>Ability awakenings increase his damage significantly and give him a 45% ATK/MAG break.</li>
<li>His primary chaining move, <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a>, makes him a compatible chainer with many other units including <a href="/Fryevia" title="Fryevia">Fryevia</a> and <a href="/Sephiroth" title="Sephiroth">Sephiroth</a>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Orochi"><a href="/Orochi" title="Orochi">Orochi</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-196" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-196" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical solo damage dealer.</li>
<li>With ability awakenings, can AoE chain with <a href="/C-C-Cold_Breath" title="C-C-Cold Breath">C-C-Cold Breath</a>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Orran"><a href="/Orran" title="Orran">Orran</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-197" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-197" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre and very niche support unit.</li>
<li>Can slightly buff all elemental resists, restore a bit of MP to allies, and buff certain stats.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ozetta"><a href="/Ozetta" title="Ozetta">Ozetta</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-198" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-198" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid provoke tank with built-in mitigation.</li>
<li>Powerful AoE mitigation on her LB.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Papalymo"><a href="/Papalymo" title="Papalymo">Papalymo</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-199" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-199" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely weak magic damage dealer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pecciotta"><a href="/Pecciotta" title="Pecciotta">Pecciotta</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-200" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-200" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Niche support unit that, when geared appropriately, can double as an evasion provoke tank.</li>
<li>Can break ATK and MAG by 45%, or by 40% in an AoE. Also has ST charm attached to the 45% break, although most bosses are immune.</li>
<li>The combination of innate evasion and innate draw chance make him easier to gear as an evasion provoker than most units.</li>
<li>Has <a href="/Barblizzaga" title="Barblizzaga">Barblizzaga</a>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pirate_Jake"><a href="/Pirate_Jake" title="Pirate Jake">Pirate Jake</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-201" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-201" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical chainer.</li>
<li>Innate dual wield for guns and swords.</li>
<li>With his ability awakenings, he chains with the <a href="/Quick_Hit" title="Quick Hit">Quick Hit</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="PNK-2"><a href="/PNK-2" title="PNK-2">PNK-2</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-202" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-202" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Doesn't fit into any role because he's absolutely terrible at everything.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Popoi"><a href="/Popoi" title="Popoi">Popoi</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-203" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-203" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak magical damage dealer.</li>
<li>Its ability awakenings give it some weak breaks (40%) that are split the wrong way.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Popstar_Katy"><a href="/Popstar_Katy" title="Popstar Katy">Popstar Katy</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-204" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-204" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Incredibly terrible magical damage dealer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Primm"><a href="/Primm" title="Primm">Primm</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-205" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-205" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak hybrid and magic damage dealer/healer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Prishe"><a href="/Prishe" title="Prishe">Prishe</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-206" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-206" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>A decent physical chainer with some support skills, but she takes a few turns to build up combos to reach her strong damage skills, which limits her effectiveness.</li>
<li>Her LB can do decent damage while debuffing DEF/SPR (up to -64%).</li>
<li>Utility includes AoE MP regen, on-demand single-target reraise, and AoE reraise at the end of a three-turn combo.</li>
<li>With her ability awakenings, she gains the ability to continually use the final move of her damaging combo once it's unlocked, which allows her to deal incredibly high sustained damage, and she gains excellent elemental flexibility due to imperiling all elements. However, the ramp up time is still a significant downside, and she still lacks strong chaining partners.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Prompto"><a href="/Prompto" title="Prompto">Prompto</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-207" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-207" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical chainer with excellent utility.</li>
<li>Can dualcast his abilities, but this causes him to burn through his MP very quickly.</li>
<li>Can AoE break ATK/MAG by 50%, imperil several different elements, break DEF by 45%, and raise allies.</li>
<li>If he is given TDH, his damage skyrockets.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pure_Summoner_Rydia"><a href="/Pure_Summoner_Rydia" title="Pure Summoner Rydia">Pure Summoner Rydia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-208" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-208" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Magic wind/earth chainer and summoner.</li>
<li>Damage output is mediocre at best, but she does have a few chaining partners, such as <a href="/William" title="William">William</a> and <a href="/Barbariccia" title="Barbariccia">Barbariccia</a>.</li>
<li>Her esper gauge skills aren't that impressive.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pyro_Glacial_Lasswell"><a href="/Pyro_Glacial_Lasswell" title="Pyro Glacial Lasswell">Pyro Glacial Lasswell</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-209" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-209" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Easy to gear and has innate dual wield, but has lackluster damage output.</li>
<li>He doesn't chain, and he doesn't work well as a solo damage dealer, so he will sit on the bench for almost every endgame trial unless you're severely lacking in options.</li>
<li>His damage relies heavily on his limit burst, which takes a long time to fill.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Qin"><a href="/Qin" title="Qin">Qin</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-210" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-210" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid support unit.</li>
<li>Can provide stat buffs and breaks, but the breaks vary wildly in magnitude each turn.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Queen"><a href="/Queen" title="Queen">Queen</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-211" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-211" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Without ability awakenings, she is nigh unusable, as having to go under 3% HP is very risky, therefore do not use.</li>
<li>With her ability awakenings, she becomes a solid solo damage dealer with excellent AoE MP recovery.</li>
<li><a href="/Berserk" title="Berserk">Berserk</a> also gives her massively increased DEF/SPR, making her hard to kill.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Raegen"><a href="/Raegen" title="Raegen">Raegen</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-212" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-212" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent fire/ice physical chainer with solid utility.</li>
<li>Has innate dual wield and powerful ATK passives, making him very easy to gear.</li>
<li>Can buff almost any elemental resistance by 50-70% and provide mediocre breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rain"><a href="/Rain" title="Rain">Rain</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-213" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-213" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Poor support unit with outdated skills.</li>
<li>Can break and buff various stats, but not by much.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ramza"><a href="/Ramza" title="Ramza">Ramza</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-214" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-214" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Is absolutely awful until you awaken his abilities, particularly Hero's Rhyme. Once you do, though...</li>
<li>Can provide powerful stat buffs and restore HP/MP to the entire party while singing, making him one of the best support units in the game.</li>
<li>He can also break the enemy's ATK and MAG by 60%, drastically reducing their damage, although these two breaks are on separate skills and he can't use them (or anything else) while singing.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Randi"><a href="/Randi" title="Randi">Randi</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-215" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-215" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Requires his ability awakenings to be good.</li>
<li>Solid physical wind chainer.</li>
<li>His best skills are locked behind a setup move.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rasler"><a href="/Rasler" title="Rasler">Rasler</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-216" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-216" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Prior to his ability awakenings, he's an awful cover tank with a very weak chaining move.</li>
<li>His ability awakenings make him into a viable and durable cover tank, although he lacks meaningful utility.</li>
<li>Can AoE buff light resistance.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ravus"><a href="/Ravus" title="Ravus">Ravus</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-217" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-217" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak physical chainer.</li>
<li>Can buff dark resistance by 70%.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ray_Jack"><a href="/Ray_Jack" title="Ray Jack">Ray Jack</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-218" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-218" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical light chainer with a habit of killing himself and party members.</li>
<li>Despite doing decent damage, his cover passive can interfere with your tanks and cause serious problems.</li>
<li>His ability awakenings improve his damage and reduce the cover chance, making him less of a danger, but he's still risky to use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Reberta"><a href="/Reberta" title="Reberta">Reberta</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-219" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-219" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Prior to her ability awakenings, she's a mediocre physical chainer.</li>
<li>After her ability awakenings, <a href="/Death_Crimson" title="Death Crimson">Death Crimson</a> becomes a monstrously powerful attack that allows her to either partially chain with a copy for massive damage, or function as a potent solo damage dealer.</li>
<li>Mystic Thrust +2 also allows her to AoE chain. Note that the hit count changes with the enhancement, so she cannot chain with unenhanced Rebertas.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Refia"><a href="/Refia" title="Refia">Refia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-220" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-220" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent healer with a very standard healer kit.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Reimi"><a href="/Reimi" title="Reimi">Reimi</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-221" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-221" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak physical chainer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Reis"><a href="/Reis" title="Reis">Reis</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-222" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-222" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak magic chainer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rem"><a href="/Rem" title="Rem">Rem</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-223" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-223" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good healer with innate <a href="/Dualcast" title="Dualcast">Dualcast</a>.</li>
<li>Can also deal decent damage with <a href="/Dagger_Boomerang" title="Dagger Boomerang">Dagger Boomerang</a>, which will hit twice with dual wield.</li>
<li>Has innate dual wield for daggers.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rena"><a href="/Rena" title="Rena">Rena</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-224" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-224" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent healer and support unit.</li>
<li>Has massively powerful AoE heals, is immune to stop, and can cure stop/all ailments. Most of her abilities can also be dualcast.</li>
<li>On top of that, she can buff SPR and magic mitigation, and her LB provides massive buffs to all stats, along with HP and MP regeneration.</li>
<li>Unfortunately, unlike most healers, she cannot dispel enemies.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rico_Rodriguez"><a href="/Rico_Rodriguez" title="Rico Rodriguez">Rico Rodriguez</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-225" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-225" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent physical chainer.</li>
<li>Innate dual wield.</li>
<li>Can AoE chain, and has <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> frames, giving him several chaining partners.</li>
<li>Has ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR breaks (45%).</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rinoa"><a href="/Rinoa" title="Rinoa">Rinoa</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-226" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-226" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre magic chainer or solo damage dealer with solid utility.</li>
<li>She has <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a>, but lacks Aeroja to cap her own chains, which limits her damage potential as a chainer. She can mix in her LB for some extra damage, but it's still not very impressive.</li>
<li>She can also function as a solo damage dealer by using either <a href="/Apocalypse_(Ability)" title="Apocalypse (Ability)">Apocalypse</a> or <a href="/Angelo_Tackle" title="Angelo Tackle">Angelo Tackle</a>. The damage on these is okay but not fantastic, and Apocalypse will burn through her MP very quickly.</li>
<li>She can AoE break ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR by 45%, and has Curaga, Full Life, and Aura.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rikku"><a href="/Rikku" title="Rikku">Rikku</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-227" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-227" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Niche support unit.</li>
<li>Can provide AoE reraise via her LB.</li>
<li>Can also buff mitigation by 30% and elemental resistances by 40%, but this is locked behind a setup turn.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rosa"><a href="/Rosa" title="Rosa">Rosa</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-228" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-228" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid healer with excellent AoE MP restoration.</li>
<li>Can cure breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Roselia"><a href="/Roselia" title="Roselia">Roselia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-229" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-229" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid healer with innate triplecast.</li>
<li>Can restore MP to allies.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Roy"><a href="/Roy" title="Roy">Roy</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-230" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-230" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent support unit with powerful buffs and AoE HP/MP recovery.</li>
<li>After several turns of setup, also provides a 45% full break.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rubicante"><a href="/Rubicante" title="Rubicante">Rubicante</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-231" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-231" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre solo fire magic damage dealer.</li>
<li>Has innate dualcast.</li>
<li>Niche magic damage counters.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ruggles"><a href="/Ruggles" title="Ruggles">Ruggles</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-232" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-232" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak physical chainer.</li>
<li>Can buff earth resistance by 70%.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ryumynui"><a href="/Ryumynui" title="Ryumynui">Ryumynui</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-233" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-233" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good support unit with decent buffs.</li>
<li>Unfortunately, her best skill is locked behind a setup turn, so there will be gaps in her buff coverage.</li>
<li>Also provides HP/MP regen and an LB fill rate while providing stat buffs.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sandee"><a href="/Sandee" title="Sandee">Sandee</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-234" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-234" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak healer/support unit.</li>
<li>Can grant AoE break immunity and ailment immunity for one turn.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Santa_Roselia"><a href="/Santa_Roselia" title="Santa Roselia">Santa Roselia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-235" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-235" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent healer with a pretty standard kit.</li>
<li>Does <i>not</i> have <a href="/Raise" title="Raise">Raise</a>.</li>
<li>May counter enemy hits with heals.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Seabreeze_Dark_Fina"><a href="/Seabreeze_Dark_Fina" title="Seabreeze Dark Fina">Seabreeze Dark Fina</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-236" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-236" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak magic damage dealer both before and after her ability awakenings.</li>
<li>Has a 45% AoE full break.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Seaside_Nichol"><a href="/Seaside_Nichol" title="Seaside Nichol">Seaside Nichol</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-237" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-237" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent support unit focusing exclusively on defensive buffs.</li>
<li>Can provide significant DEF/SPR buffs, all three types of mitigation, and some minor barriers.</li>
<li>Unfortunately, his physical/magical mitigation buffs cannot be dualcast, which means he cannot provide much in the way of HP/MP restoration while maintaining those.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sephiroth"><a href="/Sephiroth" title="Sephiroth">Sephiroth</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-238" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-238" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful dark/light physical chainer with many chaining partners.</li>
<li><a href="/The_Heavens_Wept" title="The Heavens Wept">The Heavens Wept</a> is from the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> chaining family, <a href="/Aeolian_Onslaught" title="Aeolian Onslaught">Aeolian Onslaught</a> chains with Onion Slice, and <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> chains with <a href="/Circular_Saw" title="Circular Saw">Circular Saw</a>.</li>
<li>Is very durable for a damage dealer, and, in a pinch, he can help sustain his own HP/MP with <a href="/Reunion" title="Reunion">Reunion</a>.</li>
<li>Has a massive 100% light/dark imperil on his LB.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Setzer"><a href="/Setzer" title="Setzer">Setzer</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-239" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-239" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak physical chainer.</li>
<li>Has abilities that deal fixed (non-scaling damage), which can be useful for cheesing enemies with very high DEF/SPR.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Seven"><a href="/Seven" title="Seven">Seven</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-240" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-240" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Support unit who, with her ability awakenings, can imperil fire, ice, and lightning by 70%, but doesn't bring anything else of value to the table.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Seymour"><a href="/Seymour" title="Seymour">Seymour</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-241" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-241" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak and terrible solo magic damage dealer.</li>
<li>Has a couple of EVO MAG passives which increase summon damage, but has no way to efficiently fill the esper gauge.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Shadow_Lord"><a href="/Shadow_Lord" title="Shadow Lord">Shadow Lord</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-242" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-242" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Dark damage dealer who burns through his own HP.</li>
<li>His damage is mid-tier, but the fact that he tends to kill himself is a significant problem.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Shatal"><a href="/Shatal" title="Shatal">Shatal</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-243" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-243" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid provoke tank with built-in mitigation.</li>
<li>Powerful AoE mitigation and break resistance on his LB.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Shine"><a href="/Shine" title="Shine">Shine</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-244" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-244" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak dark physical damage dealer with poor stats and a terrible equipment selection.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Shinju"><a href="/Shinju" title="Shinju">Shinju</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-245" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-245" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre earth physical chainer.</li>
<li>Her ATK and equipment selection are very limited, but she has <a href="/Piledriver" title="Piledriver">Piledriver</a> frames, making her compatible with the <a href="/Aileen" title="Aileen">Aileen</a> chaining family.</li>
<li>Can buff the DEF/SPR of allies (but not herself) by 80%.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Shylt"><a href="/Shylt" title="Shylt">Shylt</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-246" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-246" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Magic cover tank with excellent utility.</li>
<li>Has limited equipment selection and mediocre base stats, which can leave him a bit squishy.</li>
<li>Can provide AoE resistance to breaks and stop, as well as 42% mitigation.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sieghard"><a href="/Sieghard" title="Sieghard">Sieghard</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-247" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-247" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent physical cover and provoke tank.</li>
<li>Has a 50% full break.</li>
<li>His LB provides a powerful 42% mitigation buff for three turns.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Silvia"><a href="/Silvia" title="Silvia">Silvia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-248" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-248" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Support unit that can provide a wide variety of elemental resistance buffs, as well as AoE immunity to breaks and Stop.</li>
<li>Her skills do very little damage, so it's not worth focusing on her offensive stats.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Snow"><a href="/Snow" title="Snow">Snow</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-249" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-249" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Snow serves as an object lesson in how there's more to being a provoke tank than just making the boss attack you-- you have to be able to survive.</li>
<li>Has terrible defensive stats and poor equipment selection. Also, he doesn't have mitigation, which leads to him taking a dirt nap if he tries to tank harder bosses.</li>
<li>Has a decent counter chance, so if he somehow survives the onslaught (spoiler: he won't), he'll generate some LB and esper crystals for your party.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Soleil"><a href="/Soleil" title="Soleil">Soleil</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-250" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-250" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Without her ability awakenings, Soleil is basically useless.</li>
<li>With them, she becomes a solid buffer, with high stat boosts to the entire team, along with some weak breaks.</li>
<li>However, she is locked into a constant rotation and does nothing else, which may not be worth a unit slot on harder encounters.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sophia"><a href="/Sophia" title="Sophia">Sophia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-251" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-251" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar ice magic chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Freeze" title="Freeze">Freeze</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sora"><a href="/Sora" title="Sora">Sora</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-252" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-252" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent physical chainer. Has triple cast, allowing him to chain well with certain 7* units.</li>
<li>Has no imperils of his own.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family. Also has a much weaker move from the <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a> family.</li>
<li>Burns through MP at an alarming rate.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sozhe"><a href="/Sozhe" title="Sozhe">Sozhe</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-253" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-253" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>His kit is a weird and terrible mix of bad damage skills and even worse tanking skills.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sportive_Ariana"><a href="/Sportive_Ariana" title="Sportive Ariana">Sportive Ariana</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-254" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-254" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible provoke tank with bad stats and worse skills.</li>
<li>Can provide AoE mitigation.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Squall"><a href="/Squall" title="Squall">Squall</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-255" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-255" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent physical chainer with elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>His modifiers are very low, but his LB is powerful. Sadly, it does not chain perfectly.</li>
<li>Even if you do not have TDH, he should be given a two-handed weapon, because the bulk of his damage comes from his LB.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Steiner"><a href="/Steiner" title="Steiner">Steiner</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-256" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-256" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak physical damage dealer.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Summertime_Luka"><a href="/Summertime_Luka" title="Summertime Luka">Summertime Luka</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-257" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-257" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Water magical chainer with healing effects attached to her damage skill.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Flood" title="Flood">Flood</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Suzume"><a href="/Suzume" title="Suzume">Suzume</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-258" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-258" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible physical finisher.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Terra"><a href="/Terra" title="Terra">Terra</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-259" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-259" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak magic chainer and even weaker healer, even with her ability awakenings.</li>
<li><a href="/Chaos_Wave" title="Chaos Wave">Chaos Wave</a> deals okay damage, but has to be unlocked by using another ability.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Theobald"><a href="/Theobald" title="Theobald">Theobald</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-260" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-260" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid magic water chainer with <a href="/Flood" title="Flood">Flood</a> and <a href="/Waterja" title="Waterja">Waterja</a>.</li>
<li>Has innate dualcast.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Tiana"><a href="/Tiana" title="Tiana">Tiana</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-261" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-261" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak fire magic chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaos_Wave" title="Chaos Wave">Chaos Wave</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Tidus"><a href="/Tidus" title="Tidus">Tidus</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-262" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-262" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Prior to ability awakenings, Tidus is a solid physical water chainer with decent damage modifiers, a strong imperil, and some utility (MP Refresh, Entrust).</li>
<li>His ability awakenings boost his damage into the stratosphere, leaving him as one of the strongest physical damage dealers in the game.</li>
<li>His water imperil is attached to his LB, but his innate High Tide effect means that it only takes a turn or two to charge up.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Tifa"><a href="/Tifa" title="Tifa">Tifa</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-263" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-263" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good water physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Tilith"><a href="/Tilith" title="Tilith">Tilith</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-264" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-264" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful ability-based healer with a versatile kit.</li>
<li>Can heal all party members to full, or revive all dead allies, but not at the same time.</li>
<li><a href="/Goddess%27s_Miracle" title="Goddess&#39;s Miracle">Goddess's Miracle</a> heals and recovers most status ailments (all allies) in one skill.</li>
<li>Can also buff elemental resistances, grant break immunity, and restore MP.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Tinkerer_Carrie"><a href="/Tinkerer_Carrie" title="Tinkerer Carrie">Tinkerer Carrie</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-265" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-265" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer with weak stats and poor equipment selection.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Trance_Terra"><a href="/Trance_Terra" title="Trance Terra">Trance Terra</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-266" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-266" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Needs ability awakenings to be good.</li>
<li>Deals absurdly high AoE magic damage by dualcasting Chaos Wave - Awakened.</li>
<li>Must spend the first turn using Magical Activation, and needs to use it again once every five turns.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Vincent"><a href="/Vincent" title="Vincent">Vincent</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-267" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-267" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical chainer with good utility.</li>
<li>Requires an external imperil and lacks any chaining partners.</li>
<li>Has a single target 55% full break.</li></ul>
<h4><span id="Überkilling_Machine"></span><span class="mw-headline" id=".C3.9Cberkilling_Machine"><a href="/%C3%9Cberkilling_Machine" title="Überkilling Machine">Überkilling Machine</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-268" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-268" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak physical chainer with innate dual wield.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ukiyo"><a href="/Ukiyo" title="Ukiyo">Ukiyo</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-269" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-269" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent light/dark/nonelemental magic chainer.</li>
<li>Has some decent utility-- mitigation and light/dark resistance buffs.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ulrica"><a href="/Ulrica" title="Ulrica">Ulrica</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-270" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-270" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Awful physical damage dealer heavily based around counters.</li>
<li>Her stats are garbage, and if she's getting hit enough to deal decent damage, she's probably going to die anyways.</li></ul>
<h4><span id="Václav_Koller"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="V.C3.A1clav_Koller"><a href="/V%C3%A1clav_Koller" title="Václav Koller">Václav Koller</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-271" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-271" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak physical chainer who can temporarily unlock a move with <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> frames.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Vaan"><a href="/Vaan" title="Vaan">Vaan</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-272" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-272" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer with a bit of utility.</li>
<li>Can provide AoE stop immunity.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Vagrant_Knight_Rain"><a href="/Vagrant_Knight_Rain" title="Vagrant Knight Rain">Vagrant Knight Rain</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-273" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-273" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid provoke tank with decent utility.</li>
<li>Has 40% breaks and 60% stat buffs, which are unimpressive but usable.</li>
<li>Has increased LB fill rate and <a href="/Entrust" title="Entrust">Entrust</a>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Vargas"><a href="/Vargas" title="Vargas">Vargas</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-274" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-274" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak fire physical solo damage dealer.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Vayne"><a href="/Vayne" title="Vayne">Vayne</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-275" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-275" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar support unit.</li>
<li>Can provide single-target physical or magical mitigation and break resistance to the corresponding stat.</li>
<li>Can buff light/dark resistance and increase LB fill rate.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Veritas_of_the_Dark"><a href="/Veritas_of_the_Dark" title="Veritas of the Dark">Veritas of the Dark</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-276" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-276" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent dark chainer with some additional utility.</li>
<li><a href="/Dark_Punishment" title="Dark Punishment">Dark Punishment</a> can chain with <a href="/Orlandeau" title="Orlandeau">Orlandeau</a>'s <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and other similar moves.</li>
<li>Has an AoE 45% full break and AoE dark resistance.</li>
<li>With his ability awakenings, his damage increases significantly, making him an excellent chainer.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Veritas_of_the_Earth"><a href="/Veritas_of_the_Earth" title="Veritas of the Earth">Veritas of the Earth</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-277" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-277" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical cover tank with some good utility.</li>
<li>Has powerful AoE mitigation on his LB, AoE earth resistance, and 20% AoE mitigation.</li>
<li>His survivability is on the low end for physical cover tanks, so survival may be a problem when going up against harder hitting bosses.</li>
<li>He *can* provoke but usually shouldn't, since it lacks mitigation and will probably get him killed.</li>
<li>With ability awakenings, his survivability is drastically improved and his provoke gains mitigation, allowing him to serve as both a physical cover tank and a provoke tank at the same time, making him into a very powerful tank.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Veritas_of_the_Flame"><a href="/Veritas_of_the_Flame" title="Veritas of the Flame">Veritas of the Flame</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-278" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-278" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>A subpar solo damage dealer who can use a wide variety of elements.</li>
<li>His strongest move is only usable at random as a counter unlock, and his other attacks are quite weak.</li>
<li>He learns 4 "Axe" skills that can lower resistance (-50%) to fire, wind, earth or dark. Fire is preferred, since he can also lower fire resistance (-100%) via counter.</li>
<li>His ability awakenings increase his damage, but not by enough to make him particularly relevant.</li></ul>
