<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Veritas_of_the_Heavens"><a href="/Veritas_of_the_Heavens" title="Veritas of the Heavens">Veritas of the Heavens</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-279" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-279" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical wind damage dealer that totally blows.</li>
<li>Puns aside, he's not good. He has a halfway decent chaining move, a good wind imperil on his LB, and absorbs wind damage. Sadly, that's not enough to make him a worthwhile unit.</li>
<li>His ability awakenings focus on his terrible jump attacks and do not making him any less niche.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Veritas_of_the_Light"><a href="/Veritas_of_the_Light" title="Veritas of the Light">Veritas of the Light</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-280" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-280" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid hybrid light chainer, but unfortunately suffers from being restricted to a single element, one that tends to be resisted quite often.</li>
<li>Her stats and modifiers are a bit on the low side, which means she falls short of doing top tier damage.</li>
<li>Has innate dualwield (guns, throwing weapons) as well as a light imperil to boost her own damage. Her LB has special mention as it is an extremely powerful DEF/SPR break, nearly quadrupling her damage output.</li>
<li>One of the very few AoE chainers in the game.</li>
<li>Her ability awakenings improve her damage output by quite a bit, making her one of the strongest AoE damage dealers in the game. Unfortunately, she is still locked into dealing light damage and has no other chaining partners.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Veritas_of_the_Water"><a href="/Veritas_of_the_Water" class="mw-redirect" title="Veritas of the Water">Veritas of the Water</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-281" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-281" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>A serviceable healer with access to Curaga, Raise and Esunaga. While she does have an innate dualcast this is locked behind using a particular skill, meaning it will not be available turn 1. Also worth mentioning is an unlockable AoE full break in the same vein as Dualcast.</li>
<li>She's better off using an external source of <a href="/Dualcast" title="Dualcast">Dualcast</a> rather than wasting turns to temporarily unlock it.</li>
<li>Her ability awakenings make her Dualcast unlock last for 20 turns and give her some largely irrelevant utility, which makes her a decent budget option for brand new players, but she falls of quickly later on and probably isn't worth the investment.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verun"><a href="/Verun" title="Verun">Verun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-282" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-282" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre support unit with powerful AoE stat buffs from his limit burst.</li>
<li>He also has a few imperils and breaks, and the ability to grant killer effects to allies.</li>
<li>Very similar to Soleil, albeit with a bit of ramp-up time before he can get his stat buffs going. Once he does, though, he's arguably stronger.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Victoria"><a href="/Victoria" title="Victoria">Victoria</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-283" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-283" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Victoria can be used in one of two ways-- either as a solo damage dealer by dualcasting Firaja, or by chaining with another Victoria using Overflow.</li>
<li>Her damage isn't top tier, but it's solid enough that you can make good use of her if you lack better units.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Viktor_Marchenko"><a href="/Viktor_Marchenko" title="Viktor Marchenko">Viktor Marchenko</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-284" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-284" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Passable provoke tank with self-sustain.</li>
<li>Can buff himself with immunity to ailments, charm, stop, and breaks.</li>
<li>Can cap chains with a DEF-scaling attack.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Vivi"><a href="/Vivi" title="Vivi">Vivi</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-285" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-285" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Alarmingly terrible magic damage dealer. His moves run the gamut between "extremely weak" and "fairly weak but kill your entire team".</li>
<li>His ability awakenings get rid of the team-killing downside, but even then, his damage is awful.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Wadow"><a href="/Wadow" title="Wadow">Wadow</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-286" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-286" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak earth hybrid chainer with a bit of utility.</li>
<li>Can buff earth/light resistance and provide 30% mitigation.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Quake" title="Quake">Quake</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Wakka"><a href="/Wakka" title="Wakka">Wakka</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-287" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-287" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak physical solo damage dealer.</li>
<li>His strongest attack uses random elements, which is a serious downside, especially if the boss has resistances.</li>
<li>Can buff water resistance by 50%.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Warrior_of_Light"><a href="/Warrior_of_Light" title="Warrior of Light">Warrior of Light</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-288" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-288" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent physical cover tank with solid utility.</li>
<li>Can break ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR by 45%.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Werei"><a href="/Werei" title="Werei">Werei</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-289" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-289" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible earth physical solo damage dealer.</li>
<li>Can buff earth resistance by 50%.</li>
<li>His ability awakenings don't make him any more usable.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="White_Knight_Noel"><a href="/White_Knight_Noel" title="White Knight Noel">White Knight Noel</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-290" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-290" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Noel is the most durable provoke tank in the game by a wide margin. Ignore the magic damage aspects of his kit and focus on his survivability-- he will pull all single-target attacks to himself and simply refuses to die no matter what happens.</li>
<li>His unique mitigation stacks with "universal" mitigation (e.g. <a href="/Rikku" title="Rikku">Rikku</a>'s <a href="/Hyper_NulAll" title="Hyper NulAll">Hyper NulAll</a>)</li>
<li>Damage spells and counters are negligible in boss fights, although his ability to imperil can occasionally be relevant.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="White_Witch_Fina"><a href="/White_Witch_Fina" title="White Witch Fina">White Witch Fina</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-291" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-291" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent healer that can restore significant MP to allies.</li>
<li>Lacks <a href="/Curaga" title="Curaga">Curaga</a>, but her high SPR lets her make do with <a href="/Cura" title="Cura">Cura</a> instead.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Wilhelm"><a href="/Wilhelm" title="Wilhelm">Wilhelm</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-292" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-292" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent and durable provoke tank with good utility.</li>
<li>His limit burst provides 54% mitigation to the team for one turn.</li>
<li>Can significantly buff DEF/SPR, boost LB fill rate, and provide more minor ATK/MAG buffs.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="William"><a href="/William" title="William">William</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-293" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-293" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent earth magical chainer with a bit of utility on the side.</li>
<li>Can buff DEF and SPR by 110% (with separate skills), but this comes at the cost of breaking the corresponding offensive stat (ATK and MAG) by 50%.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Xiao"><a href="/Xiao" title="Xiao">Xiao</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-294" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-294" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Prior to her ability awakenings, she's an absolutely awful physical damage dealer.</li>
<li>With her ability awakenings, she's an absolutely awful provoke tank.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Xon"><a href="/Xon" title="Xon">Xon</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-295" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-295" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Useful for farming and not much else.</li>
<li>Can steal from all enemies at once.</li>
<li>Can copy stat buffs from enemies onto allies. With ability awakenings, this skill also provides break immunity.</li>
<li>Improves drop rates of rare items.</li></ul>
<h4><span id="Y'shtola"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Y.27shtola"><a href="/Y%27shtola" title="Y&#39;shtola">Y'shtola</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-296" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-296" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent healer with innate dualcast.</li>
<li>Has a little bit of utility-- 54% AoE mitigation on her LB, as well as a few other largely irrelevant skills.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Yan"><a href="/Yan" title="Yan">Yan</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-297" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-297" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent and versatile support unit.</li>
<li>Can provide AoE break resistance, MP recovery, healing, 30% mitigation, and LB fill rate.</li>
<li>Her LB applies AoE reraise and 64% resistance to all elements.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Yang"><a href="/Yang" title="Yang">Yang</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-298" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-298" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer with W-Ability.</li>
<li>Unfortunately, the lack of TDH options outside of 5* TMs limits his damage severely.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Yda"><a href="/Yda" title="Yda">Yda</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-299" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-299" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak physical damage dealer.</li>
<li>Her strongest skills are locked behind a long combo sequence, and even then they aren't very good.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Yubel"><a href="/Yubel" title="Yubel">Yubel</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-300" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-300" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak physical chainer that can swap between dark and ice.</li>
<li>Chains with <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a> family.</li>
<li>Also has an innate provoke and 20% evasion, opening up possibilities as a dodge provoke tank.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Yun"><a href="/Yun" title="Yun">Yun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-301" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-301" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Prior to his ability awakenings, he is a subpar fire physical chainer.</li>
<li>With his ability awakenings, his damage skyrockets, putting him near the top tier of chainers, and he gains innate dual wield.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Yuna"><a href="/Yuna" title="Yuna">Yuna</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-302" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-302" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent healer with some elemental resistance buffs.</li>
<li>One of the few units in the game that can dualcast <a href="/Reraise" title="Reraise">Reraise</a>.</li>
<li>Also has a few summoner skills, including the ability to partially fill up the esper gauge.</li>
<li>Can significantly buff the DEF/SPR of all allies via her LB.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Yuraisha"><a href="/Yuraisha" title="Yuraisha">Yuraisha</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-303" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-303" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent support unit with powerful buffs.</li>
<li>Can provide large buffs to all stats, as well as all three types of mitigation.</li>
<li>Has AoE barriers, resistance buffs, and AoE HP/MP regen.</li>
<li>Can cure breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Yuri"><a href="/Yuri" title="Yuri">Yuri</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-304" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-304" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely weak hybrid chainer.</li>
<li>Can chain with Prompto, Reberta, and Sephiroth.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Zargabaath"><a href="/Zargabaath" title="Zargabaath">Zargabaath</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-305" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-305" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent and versatile support unit with a diverse set of skills. Stat buffs, mitigation, single-target HP/MP recovery, elemental resistances, and AoE immunity to certain ailments.</li>
<li>His MP restoration is massive but single-target, so sustaining the entire party may be rough as he has to rotate through each ally.</li>
<li>He burns through quite a bit of MP. He can self-cast Rejuvenate to keep himself going, but if you gear him for MP regen, it helps to free up his actions to do other things.</li>
<li>With his ability awakenings, he can also provide single-target reraise with <a href="/Rejuvenate" title="Rejuvenate">Rejuvenate</a>. They also significantly improve his stat and mitigation buffs.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Zell"><a href="/Zell" title="Zell">Zell</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-306" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-306" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible physical chainer with equally terrible utility.</li>
<li>His strongest moves are locked behind 3 turn setups, but they're much too weak to be worth the time.</li>
<li>He has a 60% full break, but it only lasts for two turns and he can only use it after three turns spent unlocking it, which means it's basically useless.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Zidane"><a href="/Zidane" title="Zidane">Zidane</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-307" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-307" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Serviceable entry-level physical chainer.</li>
<li>You'll want to replace him with someone better as soon as possible.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Zile"><a href="/Zile" title="Zile">Zile</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-308" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-308" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible solo physical damage dealer.</li>
<li>His modifiers are all garbage, aside from moves that are locked behind setup moves. Said attacks either have a chance to fail or to hit <i>your own units</i>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Zyrus"><a href="/Zyrus" title="Zyrus">Zyrus</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-309" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(6%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-309" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak solo magic damage dealer, both before and after his ability awakenings.</li>
<li>Relies heavily on his LB to unlock W-Ability, but cannot fill it up efficiently and cannot sustain the MP use of dualcasting <a href="/Blood_Pulsar" title="Blood Pulsar">Blood Pulsar</a>.</li></ul>
<h2><span id="Unit_Summaries_(7★_Units)"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Unit_Summaries_.287.E2.98.85_Units.29"><a href="/Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)" title="Unit Summaries (7★ Units)">Unit Summaries (7★ Units)</a></span></h2>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="2B_2"><a href="/2B" title="2B">2B</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-1" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-1" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely powerful breaker and lightning physical chainer.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="A2_2"><a href="/A2" title="A2">A2</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-2" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-2" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful physical chainer that automatically provides a 50% ATK/MAG break while chaining.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ace_2"><a href="/Ace" title="Ace">Ace</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-3" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-3" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent support unit with a bit of bonus offensive potential.</li>
<li>Unfortunately, his buffs are random, but even the worst case is still decent.</li>
<li>He can also cap chains with his LB and imperil fire/lightning/light by 75%.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Adam_Jensen_2"><a href="/Adam_Jensen" title="Adam Jensen">Adam Jensen</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-4" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-4" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent fire/lightning physical chainer with innate dual wield.</li>
<li>Has extremely high burst damage via his cooldown skill, and very low damage on other turns.</li>
<li>Has a 45% full break.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aileen_2"><a href="/Aileen" title="Aileen">Aileen</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-5" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-5" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good earth physical chainer.</li>
<li>Can provide AoE LB fill.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Piledriver" title="Piledriver">Piledriver</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aloha_Lasswell_2"><a href="/Aloha_Lasswell" title="Aloha Lasswell">Aloha Lasswell</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-6" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-6" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent water/wind physical chainer with innate dual wield.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li>
<li>Can also be build as TDH, which increases his damage substantially, but reduces the number of compatible partners.</li>
<li>He has a physical AoE cover ability with a cooldown. This is extremely niche and will not see much use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ang_2"><a href="/Ang" title="Ang">Ang</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-7" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-7" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Strong fire physical finisher.</li>
<li>Relies heavily on his limit burst for optimal damage output.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aranea_2"><a href="/Aranea" title="Aranea">Aranea</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-8" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-8" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical finisher.</li>
<li>Has no utility and requires several turns of setup for one turn of mediocre burst damage.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Arngrim_2"><a href="/Arngrim" title="Arngrim">Arngrim</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-9" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-9" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent fire finisher.</li>
<li>Burns through MP very quickly.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Atoning_Dragoon_Kain_2"><a href="/Atoning_Dragoon_Kain" title="Atoning Dragoon Kain">Atoning Dragoon Kain</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-10" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-10" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent physical finisher with some elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Requires several turns of setup.</li>
<li>Can also chain with <a href="/Lila" title="Lila">Lila</a> and with the <a href="/Piledriver" title="Piledriver">Piledriver</a> family, but his damage is quite low.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Auron_2"><a href="/Auron" title="Auron">Auron</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-11" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-11" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely powerful breaker with solid physical chaining and elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Aurora_Fryevia_2"><a href="/Aurora_Fryevia" title="Aurora Fryevia">Aurora Fryevia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-12" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-12" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely powerful light hybrid chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with several families, including <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a>, <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a>, and <a href="/Aureole_Ray" title="Aureole Ray">Aureole Ray</a>.</li>
<li>She burns through MP very quickly, and her damage drops significantly when using anything other than DR frames.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Awakened_Rain_2"><a href="/Awakened_Rain" title="Awakened Rain">Awakened Rain</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-13" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-13" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely powerful magic cover and provoke tank.</li>
<li>Can grant ailment/stop immunity to allies.</li>
<li>Has AoE heals/MP restoration, at the cost of LB gauge.</li>
<li>Rotation can be a bit clunky due to the short duration of his provoke.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ayaka_2"><a href="/Ayaka" title="Ayaka">Ayaka</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-14" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-14" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful healer with great utility.</li>
<li>She can provide massive healing, reraise team members, restore MP, AoE fill the LB gauge, grant immunity to stop, and protect the team with AoE barriers.</li>
<li>Her LB will also remove breaks and charm, but it takes forever to fill up.</li></ul>
<h4><span id="Bai_Hu_&amp;_Zhu_Que_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Bai_Hu_.26_Zhu_Que_2"><a href="/Bai_Hu_%26_Zhu_Que" title="Bai Hu &amp; Zhu Que">Bai Hu &amp; Zhu Que</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-15" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-15" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Great fire/lightning physical chainer.</li>
<li>Can swap elements mid-fight.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li>
<li>Has an alternate SPR-heavy build, but this option deals much less damage.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Balthier_2"><a href="/Balthier" title="Balthier">Balthier</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-16" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-16" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful physical finisher with elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>His damage output is heavily affected by randomness, and may break some chains.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Barbariccia_2"><a href="/Barbariccia" title="Barbariccia">Barbariccia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-17" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-17" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Great magical wind chainer.</li>
<li>Can cap her chains with <a href="/Raging_Wind" title="Raging Wind">Raging Wind</a> for massive damage after several turns of ramp-up, or instead cap with <a href="/Aeroja" title="Aeroja">Aeroja</a> for AoE damage.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Bart_2"><a href="/Bart" title="Bart">Bart</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-18" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-18" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Bizarre mix of dodge-based provoke tank, support, and chainer.</li>
<li>His chaining damage is fairly average.</li>
<li>Can provide 60% AoE breaks, AoE mirage, AoE LB fill rate, single target imbues, single target LB fill, and some minor AoE MP sustain.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Kingsglaive" title="Kingsglaive">Kingsglaive</a>, <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a>, and <a href="/Flood" title="Flood">Flood</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Basch_2"><a href="/Basch" title="Basch">Basch</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-19" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-19" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid physical and magical cover tank.</li>
<li>Has some support capabilities in the form of breaks and buffs.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Beatrix_2"><a href="/Beatrix" title="Beatrix">Beatrix</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-20" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-20" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful ATK/MAG breaker and chainer.</li>
<li>Her damage suffers tremendously if she tries to chain and break at the same time, so you will often just focus on breaking and let her partner do most of the damage, or bring a separate breaker and just have her chain.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Beowulf_2"><a href="/Beowulf" title="Beowulf">Beowulf</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-21" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-21" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent breaker with decent hybrid chaining capabilities.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Beryl_2"><a href="/Beryl" title="Beryl">Beryl</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-22" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-22" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent unit that can fill several roles.</li>
<li>Ideally used as either a tank who also chains, or as a chainer that also provides powerful breaks.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a>, <a href="/Chaos_Wave" title="Chaos Wave">Chaos Wave</a>, and <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Blossom_Sage_Sakura_2"><a href="/Blossom_Sage_Sakura" title="Blossom Sage Sakura">Blossom Sage Sakura</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-23" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-23" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good solo lightning magic damage dealer.</li>
<li>Requires several turns to ramp up.</li>
<li>Can burst pretty hard by using her pentacast unlock.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Chow_2"><a href="/Chow" title="Chow">Chow</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-24" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-24" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful and unusual combination of healer and magic cover tank.</li>
<li>Has <a href="/Curaja" title="Curaja">Curaja</a> along with a solid tanking kit.</li>
<li>LB is a powerful 54% mitigation cooldown that also refills the team's MP.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Christine_2"><a href="/Christine" title="Christine">Christine</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-25" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-25" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful ice magic chainer.</li>
<li>Her strongest moves have no chaining partners. She does have <a href="/Freeze" title="Freeze">Freeze</a>, but the damage is much, much lower.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Cid_2"><a href="/Cid" title="Cid">Cid</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-26" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-26" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful physical finisher.</li>
<li>Requires several turns of setup, and relies heavily on external imperils in order to deal good damage, but can burst very hard in the right circumstances.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Circe_2"><a href="/Circe" title="Circe">Circe</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-27" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-27" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful water magic chainer, after several turns of setup. She can also chain with wind/earth, but that reduces her damage significantly.</li>
<li>She relies heavily on her LB to keep her strong abilities unlocked.</li>
<li>Use her cooldowns as needed to fill the gaps in her rotation.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Flood" title="Flood">Flood</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Citra_2"><a href="/Citra" title="Citra">Citra</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-28" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-28" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible magical light chainer with some minor support capabilities.</li>
<li>She can chain with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li>
<li>Can buff the party's magic mitigation by 20%, refill MP, fill the esper gauge, and heal the party a bit.</li>
<li>All of her skills, including her evocation moves, deal very low damage.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Cloud_2"><a href="/Cloud" title="Cloud">Cloud</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-29" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-29" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical finisher.</li>
<li>Can also chain with the <a href="/Meteor_Rain" title="Meteor Rain">Meteor Rain</a> family, but the damage is pretty bad.</li></ul>
<h4><span id="Cloud_(KH)_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Cloud_.28KH.29_2"><a href="/Cloud_(KH)" title="Cloud (KH)">Cloud (KH)</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-30" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-30" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent physical chainer.</li>
<li>Has no imperils of his own, but pairs very well with other <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> chainers that can imperil for him.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Crimson_2"><a href="/Crimson" title="Crimson">Crimson</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-31" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-31" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent fire physical chainer.</li>
<li>Deals massive AoE damage with his LB.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dark_Fina_2"><a href="/Dark_Fina" title="Dark Fina">Dark Fina</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-32" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-32" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar magic chainer. She has several moves with Tornado frames.</li>
<li>Her damage pales in comparison to other 7* magic chainers. She can buff several elemental resistances by 70%, but has no other utility to make up for her awful output.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dark_Knight_Cecil_2"><a href="/Dark_Knight_Cecil" title="Dark Knight Cecil">Dark Knight Cecil</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-33" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-33" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible dark physical finisher.</li>
<li>Has lots of human killer passives, but even with those, his damage is not competitive.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dark_Knight_Luneth_2"><a href="/Dark_Knight_Luneth" title="Dark Knight Luneth">Dark Knight Luneth</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-34" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-34" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Finisher with decent damage and extreme suicidal tendencies.</li>
<li>His extremely high HP costs coupled with triple cast means that it is nearly impossible to keep alive.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Delita_2"><a href="/Delita" title="Delita">Delita</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-35" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-35" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent dark physical chainer.</li>
<li>His damage increases significantly if the enemy is susceptible to DEF breaks.</li>
<li>Can chain with 7★ <a href="/Ramza" title="Ramza">Ramza</a>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Demon_Rain_2"><a href="/Demon_Rain" title="Demon Rain">Demon Rain</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-36" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-36" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good physical cover and provoke tank.</li>
<li>Has high survivability, but almost no utility.</li>
<li>Counter damage is negligible.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dracu_Lasswell_2"><a href="/Dracu_Lasswell" title="Dracu Lasswell">Dracu Lasswell</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-37" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-37" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good ice physical chainer.</li>
<li>Can deal massive burst damage.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dragonlord_2"><a href="/Dragonlord" title="Dragonlord">Dragonlord</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-38" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-38" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent fire magical finisher.</li>
<li>Has very high modifiers, but his damage output is limited by his low MAG.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Duke_2"><a href="/Duke" title="Duke">Duke</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-39" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-39" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent ice physical finisher.</li>
<li>Requires several turns of setup.</li>
<li>Can also be used as a subpar chainer, but the damage is low and he has no partners.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Eiko_2"><a href="/Eiko" title="Eiko">Eiko</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-40" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-40" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid healer.</li>
<li>Can cure all debuffs, including berserk, charm, stop, imperils, and breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Elephim_2"><a href="/Elephim" title="Elephim">Elephim</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-41" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-41" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Great support unit with both breaks and buffs.</li>
<li>Can break ATK/MAG by 55% on T1 while also buffing DEF/SPR, then eventually ramp into her LB for a 75% full break and 145% buffs to all stats.</li>
<li>Gear her for LB autofill.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Elfreeda_2"><a href="/Elfreeda" title="Elfreeda">Elfreeda</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-42" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-42" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent provoke tank.</li>
<li>Can chain with a copy, although the damage is unremarkable.</li>
<li>Has 45% breaks that also dispel the enemy; can be useful for enemies that frequently buff themselves.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ellesperis_2"><a href="/Ellesperis" title="Ellesperis">Ellesperis</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-43" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-43" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent physical chainer with suicidal tendencies.</li>
<li>The HP costs on her abilities can make it troublesome to keep her alive, since you often need to heal her both before and after she attacks.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Elly_2"><a href="/Elly" title="Elly">Elly</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-44" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-44" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very powerful magic chainer.</li>
<li>Wind is her strongest option, but earth isn't too far behind, and she can also choose to cap some of her chains with other elements if desired.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaos_Wave" title="Chaos Wave">Chaos Wave</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Emperor_2"><a href="/Emperor" title="Emperor">Emperor</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-45" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-45" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good fire magical finisher.</li>
<li>Requires a few turns to ramp up.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Emperor_Shera_2"><a href="/Emperor_Shera" title="Emperor Shera">Emperor Shera</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-46" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-46" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar fire physical chainer.</li>
<li>Can imbue himself and another unit with fire, but this lacks 100% uptime and his terrible damage makes him a poor chaining partner.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Estark_2"><a href="/Estark" title="Estark">Estark</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-47" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-47" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre dark physical chainer with innate dual wield.</li>
<li>Has a 60% ATK break.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fayt_2"><a href="/Fayt" title="Fayt">Fayt</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-48" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-48" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent physical chainer with elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Requires quite a few turns of ramp-up to reach his maximum damage potential.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fei_2"><a href="/Fei" title="Fei">Fei</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-49" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-49" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Dark physical chainer with very high damage output.</li>
<li>Can also chain with wind, which is noticeably weaker, or with several other elements, which are drastically weaker but could be useful in certain situations.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> family (only with his dark move).</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Felix_2"><a href="/Felix" title="Felix">Felix</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-50" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-50" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful fire/earth hybrid chainer.</li>
<li>Has no real chaining partners-- technically, several of his moves do belong to the <a href="/Aureole_Ray" title="Aureole Ray">Aureole Ray</a> and <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> families, but those moves are very weak and he wants to cap his chains with the much stronger <a href="/Salute_-_Blade_Rush" title="Salute - Blade Rush">Salute - Blade Rush</a>, something that only another Felix can do.</li>
<li>Requires several turns to really get going.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fohlen_2"><a href="/Fohlen" title="Fohlen">Fohlen</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-51" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-51" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical finisher.</li>
<li>His burst is decent but requires several turns of setup.</li>
<li>He can also chain, but the damage is awful.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Folka_2"><a href="/Folka" title="Folka">Folka</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-52" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-52" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Superlative healer with a varied and powerful support kit.</li>
<li>Has Curaja and Reraise.</li>
<li>Can buff every type of mitigation (albeit on separate cooldown abilities that lack 100% uptime), provide immunity to breaks/ailments/stop/charm, and restore MP to the party.</li></ul>
<h4><span id="Freya_(VP)_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Freya_.28VP.29_2"><a href="/Freya_(VP)" title="Freya (VP)">Freya (VP)</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-53" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-53" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre magic chainer.</li>
<li>Burns through MP very quickly and is forced to use a mix of elements and non-elemental damage.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fryevia_2"><a href="/Fryevia" title="Fryevia">Fryevia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-54" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-54" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Great ice hybrid chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Gilgamesh_2"><a href="/Gilgamesh" title="Gilgamesh">Gilgamesh</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-55" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-55" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical chainer.</li>
<li>Can gear for almost any type of killer passive by equipping different weapon types.</li>
<li>Has a 55% full break.</li>
<li>He has two moves with <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> frames. The baseline move does only 7 damage. He has a much stronger version that he can unlock by using his limit burst, but it can take several turns to get to that point.</li>
<li>He fares better when chaining with a duplicate, as he can then use <a href="/Tri-Attack" title="Tri-Attack">Tri-Attack</a> starting from turn 1.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Gladiolus_2"><a href="/Gladiolus" title="Gladiolus">Gladiolus</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-56" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-56" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent physical cover tank.</li>
<li>His other skills are, unfortunately, mostly irrelevant.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Grim_Lord_Sakura_2"><a href="/Grim_Lord_Sakura" title="Grim Lord Sakura">Grim Lord Sakura</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-57" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-57" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful fire/dark magic chainer with an amazing support kit.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaos_Wave" title="Chaos Wave">Chaos Wave</a> family.</li>
<li>Can AoE buff DEF/SPR by 100%, provide 35% AoE mitigation, reraise allies, restore MP, and fill the LB gauge.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Heavenly_Technician_Lid_2"><a href="/Heavenly_Technician_Lid" title="Heavenly Technician Lid">Heavenly Technician Lid</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-58" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-58" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful breaker.</li>
<li>Lacks powerful T1 AoE breaks, but can apply them later in the fight via her LB.</li>
<li>The short duration on her breaks can be a problem.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="High_Seraph_Ultima_2"><a href="/High_Seraph_Ultima" title="High Seraph Ultima">High Seraph Ultima</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-59" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-59" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely powerful non-elemental magic chainer with solid utility.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaos_Wave" title="Chaos Wave">Chaos Wave</a> family.</li>
<li>Can simultaneously dispel enemy buffs and ally debuffs, while leaving enemy debuffs and ally buffs intact.</li>
<li>Burns through MP extremely quickly.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Hyoh_2"><a href="/Hyoh" title="Hyoh">Hyoh</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-60" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-60" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid fire/lightning physical chainer.</li>
<li>Can AoE chain with his LB.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ignacio_2"><a href="/Ignacio" title="Ignacio">Ignacio</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-61" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-61" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent finisher who can imbue other units with fire.</li>
<li>Has some minor buffing capabilities, but the stat buffs cost LB crystals.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ignis_2"><a href="/Ignis" title="Ignis">Ignis</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-62" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-62" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent buffer who requires setup turns.</li>
<li>Can provide AoE ailment and break immunity.</li>
<li>Can imbue allies with several different elements.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Jecht_2"><a href="/Jecht" title="Jecht">Jecht</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-63" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-63" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Monstrously powerful water physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Quick_Hit" title="Quick Hit">Quick Hit</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Jiraiya_2"><a href="/Jiraiya" title="Jiraiya">Jiraiya</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-64" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-64" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar hybrid chainer with some elemental flexibility.</li>
