<li>Requires setup before he can use any of his best moves, and even then his damage isn't amazing.</li>
<li>After setup, he can chain with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a>, <a href="/Kingsglaive" title="Kingsglaive">Kingsglaive</a>, and <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> families.</li>
<li>Can provide decent AoE elemental resists with attached mirage.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Karlette_2"><a href="/Karlette" title="Karlette">Karlette</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-65" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-65" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent hybrid chainer with elemental flexiblity and support capabilities.</li>
<li>Can buff elemental resistances and mitigation.</li>
<li>Can AoE break ATK/MAG by 70%, but this ability is on a cooldown.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Quick_Hit" title="Quick Hit">Quick Hit</a>, <a href="/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a>, and <a href="/Aureole_Ray" title="Aureole Ray">Aureole Ray</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Knight_Delita_2"><a href="/Knight_Delita" title="Knight Delita">Knight Delita</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-66" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-66" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical chainer or finisher with an extremely powerful 74% ATK/MAG/DEF break attached to his LB.</li>
<li>Try to gear him in ways that will let you fill up his LB by the second turn.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kryla_2"><a href="/Kryla" title="Kryla">Kryla</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-67" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-67" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent breaker, with breaks of up to 74% for every stat, including a turn 1 70% full break.</li>
<li>Can also imperil various elements and deal some fixed damage to enemies.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kunshira_2"><a href="/Kunshira" title="Kunshira">Kunshira</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-68" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-68" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good hybrid chainer with great elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Can massively buff various elemental resistances, while also buffing DEF/SPR at the same time. With two of her, you can maintain this buff 100% of the time..</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Aureole_Ray" title="Aureole Ray">Aureole Ray</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Kurasame_2"><a href="/Kurasame" title="Kurasame">Kurasame</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-69" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-69" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Hybrid ice chainer with very high damage output.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Quick_Hit" title="Quick Hit">Quick Hit</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lenneth_2"><a href="/Lenneth" title="Lenneth">Lenneth</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-70" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-70" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good dark physical chainer.</li>
<li>Has very high damage, but also very high MP consumption.</li>
<li>Can somewhat chain with the <a href="/Piledriver" title="Piledriver">Piledriver</a> family, but expect breaks as Lenneth caps her own chains and does not use Piledriver twice.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lightning_2"><a href="/Lightning" title="Lightning">Lightning</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-71" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-71" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre lightning physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Quick_Hit" title="Quick Hit">Quick Hit</a> family.</li>
<li>Buffs her own stats by 150%, which can allow you to forego a buffer.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lila_2"><a href="/Lila" title="Lila">Lila</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-72" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-72" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer with damage that scales off of her SPR.</li>
<li>She also has ATK-scaling moves, but they are much weaker.</li>
<li>She can switch between fire and lightning damage.</li>
<li>Can chain with <a href="/Atoning_Dragoon_Kain" title="Atoning Dragoon Kain">Atoning Dragoon Kain</a>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lilith_2"><a href="/Lilith" title="Lilith">Lilith</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-73" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-73" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid magic cover tank with limited utility.</li>
<li>Can also cover physical damage, but her stats are not well-suited for it.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Kingsglaive" title="Kingsglaive">Kingsglaive</a> and <a href="/Aureole_Ray" title="Aureole Ray">Aureole Ray</a> families.</li>
<li>Can provide significant self-sustain for her own HP/MP.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Livid_Shantotto_2"><a href="/Livid_Shantotto" title="Livid Shantotto">Livid Shantotto</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-74" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-74" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent magic finisher with excellent elemental flexibility who will die at the drop of a hat.</li>
<li>Her HP is horrifyingly low, even compared to 6* units, and keeping her alive can be a very real problem.</li>
<li>She requires ramp up time and unlocks to make the most of her damage potential.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Loren_2"><a href="/Loren" title="Loren">Loren</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-75" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-75" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely powerful breaker with solid physical chaining and elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a> and <a href="/Aureole_Ray" title="Aureole Ray">Aureole Ray</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lotus_Mage_Fina_2"><a href="/Lotus_Mage_Fina" title="Lotus Mage Fina">Lotus Mage Fina</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-76" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-76" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent healer with Curaja and Reraise.</li>
<li>Can also apply AoE reraise.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lucius_2"><a href="/Lucius" title="Lucius">Lucius</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-77" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-77" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent physical chainer.</li>
<li>Lacks imperils and has no utility.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Kingsglaive" title="Kingsglaive">Kingsglaive</a>, <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a>, and <a href="/Aureole_Ray" title="Aureole Ray">Aureole Ray</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lulu_2"><a href="/Lulu" title="Lulu">Lulu</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-78" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-78" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid water magic chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Flood" title="Flood">Flood</a> family.</li>
<li>Can also chain with <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a>, but the damage is much, much lower.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Lunera_2"><a href="/Lunera" title="Lunera">Lunera</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-79" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-79" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre magic chainer with some buffing capabilities.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Aureole_Ray" title="Aureole Ray">Aureole Ray</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Luneth_2"><a href="/Luneth" title="Luneth">Luneth</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-80" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-80" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical chainer with significant spike damage.</li>
<li>Only chains with a dupe.</li>
<li>The overwhelming majority of his damage comes from <a href="/Swordshower" title="Swordshower">Swordshower</a>, which he can only use once every three turns.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Machina_2"><a href="/Machina" title="Machina">Machina</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-81" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-81" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid physical chainer with several elemental options and amazing utility.</li>
<li>Can break ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR by 70% on-demand, although this only lasts for one turn and will decay into weaker breaks over the next several turns.</li>
<li>His LB breaks ATK/MAG by a massive 79%.</li>
<li>Can AoE buff physical/magical mitigation and provide SPR break immunity.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Malphasie_2"><a href="/Malphasie" title="Malphasie">Malphasie</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-82" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-82" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful wind/dark hybrid chainer with many potential chaining partners.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a>, <a href="/Aureole_Ray" title="Aureole Ray">Aureole Ray</a>, and <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a> families.</li>
<li>Can AoE chain.</li>
<li>Will sometimes counter attacks with a 60% ATK/MAG break, reducing your need for a dedicated breaker.</li>
<li>With her cooldown skill, she can AoE fill the LB gauge and break enemy DEF/SPR by 74%.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Marie_2"><a href="/Marie" title="Marie">Marie</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-83" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-83" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre support unit with lots of defensive options.</li>
<li>Can buff elemental resistances, provide elemental immunity, and (on a cooldown) provide AoE mitigation or barriers, which is good for surviving nasty boss threshold attacks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Maritime_Strategist_Nichol_2"><a href="/Maritime_Strategist_Nichol" title="Maritime Strategist Nichol">Maritime Strategist Nichol</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-84" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-84" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful buffer with access to a wide range of potent abilities.</li>
<li>Can buff all stats, regenerate HP/MP for the party, provide mitigation, buff elemental resistances, and cure breaks. Almost all of his abilities can be dualcast via <a href="/Linked_Stance" title="Linked Stance">Linked Stance</a>.</li>
<li>Can also help to fill the LB and esper gauges.</li></ul>
<h4><span id="Marquis_de_Léon_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Marquis_de_L.C3.A9on_2"><a href="/Marquis_de_L%C3%A9on" title="Marquis de Léon">Marquis de Léon</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-85" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-85" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Terrible provoke tank with a few very weak chaining skills.</li>
<li>Has a 60% break on a 5 turn cooldown, which can allow him to weaken nasty threshold attacks, but he cannot serve as a primary breaker.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Mediena_2"><a href="/Mediena" title="Mediena">Mediena</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-86" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-86" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good magic ice/wind chainer.</li>
<li>Can buff the party's stats and restore MP.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a> and <a href="/Freeze" title="Freeze">Freeze</a> families, but her damage is low with anyone other than a copy, due to mixing of various moves.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Mercenary_Ramza_2"><a href="/Mercenary_Ramza" title="Mercenary Ramza">Mercenary Ramza</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-87" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-87" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful and versatile tank. Able to provoke and cover physical or magical damage.</li>
<li>His magic cover has a cooldown, which may be a problem if you're planning to rely on reraise, or if the boss dispels him.</li>
<li>Immune to all ailments and charm. 50% resistant to Stop.</li>
<li>Has single stat 60% breaks, but can't apply them while both provoking and covering without sacrificing turns of uptime.</li>
<li>Has <a href="/Entrust" title="Entrust">Entrust</a> and a 45% ATK/MAG break.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Myra_2"><a href="/Myra" title="Myra">Myra</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-88" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-88" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent healer that can provide DEF/SPR break immunity.</li>
<li>Can also provide stat buffs (after setup), partial ailment immunity, and AoE reraise.</li>
<li>Has a version of Entrust that works with W-Ability.</li>
<li>Has Curaja and Reraise.</li>
<li>Suffers from a slightly awkward rotation.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Nameless_Gunner_Jake_2"><a href="/Nameless_Gunner_Jake" title="Nameless Gunner Jake">Nameless Gunner Jake</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-89" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-89" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent physical finisher with elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Requires several turns of setup.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Nalu_2"><a href="/Nalu" title="Nalu">Nalu</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-90" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-90" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid lightning physical chainer.</li>
<li>Has <a href="/Tidus" title="Tidus">Tidus</a> frames, giving her several chaining partners. However, because she is best build with TDH and does not have W-Ability, she will not chain properly with DW partners.</li>
<li>Also, her damage drops significantly when not chaining with a copy, due to relying on her LB and her cooldown skill, which have unique frames.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noctis_2"><a href="/Noctis" title="Noctis">Noctis</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-91" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-91" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Bizarre physical chainer who requires setup and has several turns of downtime.</li>
<li>Damage output is high while <a href="/Armiger_Wakes" title="Armiger Wakes">Armiger Wakes</a>, then plummets to almost nothing for several turns while waiting for the unlock to cool down again.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Nyx_2"><a href="/Nyx" title="Nyx">Nyx</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-92" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-92" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Physical fire chainer with good damage and utility.</li>
<li>Can AoE fill the team's LB by sacrificing his life.</li>
<li>Relies on <a href="/Fixed_Dice" title="Fixed Dice">Fixed Dice</a> for good damage output, which means that he can be very inconsistent.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Olive_2"><a href="/Olive" title="Olive">Olive</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-93" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-93" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid lightning finisher.</li>
<li>Can deal significant burst damage with <a href="/Immolation_Blast" title="Immolation Blast">Immolation Blast</a>, although you'll need to raise or reraise her, as she dies when she uses it.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Onion_Knight_2"><a href="/Onion_Knight" title="Onion Knight">Onion Knight</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-94" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-94" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good physical damage dealer with excellent elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Can break enemy DEF by 74%, and buff several elemental resistances by 70%.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Onion_Knight_Refia_2"><a href="/Onion_Knight_Refia" title="Onion Knight Refia">Onion Knight Refia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-95" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-95" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good physical damage dealer with elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a> family, but not very well, due to requiring unlocks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Orlandeau_2"><a href="/Orlandeau" title="Orlandeau">Orlandeau</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-96" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-96" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre light physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Popstar_Katy_2"><a href="/Popstar_Katy" title="Popstar Katy">Popstar Katy</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-97" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-97" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Absolutely terrible magical chainer/finisher.</li>
<li>Far worse than most 6* units.</li>
<li>Do not use.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Prishe_2"><a href="/Prishe" title="Prishe">Prishe</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-98" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-98" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical chainer.</li>
<li>Locked behind setup turns and has no chaining partners.</li>
<li>Can provide AoE reraise.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Prompto_2"><a href="/Prompto" title="Prompto">Prompto</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-99" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-99" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> family.</li>
<li>Has a 50% AoE ATK/MAG break.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pure_Summoner_Rydia_2"><a href="/Pure_Summoner_Rydia" title="Pure Summoner Rydia">Pure Summoner Rydia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-100" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-100" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Weak summoner.</li>
<li>Requires setup before bursting for very low amounts of damage.</li>
<li>Has niche applications against bosses with high mitigation, as evoke damage will ignore said mitigation.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pyro_Glacial_Lasswell_2"><a href="/Pyro_Glacial_Lasswell" title="Pyro Glacial Lasswell">Pyro Glacial Lasswell</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-101" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-101" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent fire/ice physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Qin_2"><a href="/Qin" title="Qin">Qin</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-102" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-102" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Decent support unit that suffers from extensive setup time.</li>
<li>Cannot provide all of the same benefits at once that other buffers can, forcing you to pick and choose which effects you want.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Queen_2"><a href="/Queen" title="Queen">Queen</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-103" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-103" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely powerful TDH physical chainer.</li>
<li>Has very high survivability thanks to the 200% DEF/SPR buffs from <a href="/Berserk" title="Berserk">Berserk</a>+2.</li>
<li>Provides MP regen for the party.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Quick_Hit" title="Quick Hit">Quick Hit</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Raegen_2"><a href="/Raegen" title="Raegen">Raegen</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-104" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-104" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent fire and ice physical chainer.</li>
<li>Imbues himself with both elements as part of his rotation, so his damage suffers noticeably if the enemy is immune to either one. Also partners poorly with anyone other than a dupe.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ramza_2"><a href="/Ramza" title="Ramza">Ramza</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-105" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-105" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre support unit with breaks and buffs, although he has trouble providing both at once in a clean rotation.</li>
<li>Can dualcast 60% breaks for all four stats.</li>
<li>Can sing for buffs/regen, but you will have gaps in the song buff uptime if you try to have him also maintain breaks.</li>
<li>Consider giving <a href="/Cradle_of_Horns" title="Cradle of Horns">Cradle of Horns</a> to him or another party member to cover those gaps.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Reberta_2"><a href="/Reberta" title="Reberta">Reberta</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-106" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-106" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Competent chainer or finisher.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> family, but is better off using her jumps to chain with a duplicate.</li>
<li>Lacks consistent damage output due to the random timing of jump hits.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rem_2"><a href="/Rem" title="Rem">Rem</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-107" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-107" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Unusual combination of healer and chainer.</li>
<li>Can dualcast <a href="/Curaja" title="Curaja">Curaja</a> and <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a>, allowing you to bring a chainer and a finisher than two chainers.</li>
<li>Cannot dualcast reraise, unlike most other top tier healers.</li>
<li>She can also be used as a finisher or paired chainer, but isn't that great at either.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rena_2"><a href="/Rena" title="Rena">Rena</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-108" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-108" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Healer with access to powerful buffs.</li>
<li>Relies heavily on her LB, but can struggle to fill it up consistently unless you gear for it at the expense of healing stats.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Roy_2"><a href="/Roy" title="Roy">Roy</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-109" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-109" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre support unit that provides breaks and buffs.</li>
<li>Likely needs another unit to handle breaks for a turn or two, due to spots in his rotation with weak breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Rinoa_2"><a href="/Rinoa" title="Rinoa">Rinoa</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-110" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-110" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very weak magic chainer or finisher.</li>
<li>Has 45% ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Seabreeze_Dark_Fina_2"><a href="/Seabreeze_Dark_Fina" title="Seabreeze Dark Fina">Seabreeze Dark Fina</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-111" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-111" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre magic chainer. She has several moves with Tornado frames, and also gains Flood.</li>
<li>Has a 45% full break.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Seaside_Nichol_2"><a href="/Seaside_Nichol" title="Seaside Nichol">Seaside Nichol</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-112" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-112" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent support unit focusing exclusively on defensive buffs.</li>
<li>Can provide significant DEF/SPR buffs, all three types of mitigation, and some minor barriers.</li>
<li>Unfortunately, his physical/magical mitigation buffs cannot be dualcast, which means he cannot provide much in the way of HP/MP restoration while maintaining those.</li>
<li>Has the extremely rare ability to cure imperils and berserk (as well as breaks, charm, and stop).</li>
<li>Has chaining moves with <a href="/Freeze" title="Freeze">Freeze</a> and <a href="/Flood" title="Flood">Flood</a> frames, but his personal damage is very, very low.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sephiroth_2"><a href="/Sephiroth" title="Sephiroth">Sephiroth</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-113" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-113" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent light and dark physical chainer.</li>
<li>Can swap between light and dark mid-fight via his imbues, and is fairly hard to kill (for a damage dealer).</li>
<li>Has a huge variety of available chaining partners: the <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a>, <a href="/Quick_Hit" title="Quick Hit">Quick Hit</a>, <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a>, <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a>, and <a href="/Onion_Slice" title="Onion Slice">Onion Slice</a> families.</li>
<li>His damage requires several turns to ramp up.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Shadow_Lord_2"><a href="/Shadow_Lord" title="Shadow Lord">Shadow Lord</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-114" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-114" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar dark physical chainer or finisher.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sieghard_2"><a href="/Sieghard" title="Sieghard">Sieghard</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-115" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-115" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent physical cover and provoke tank.</li>
<li>He technically <i>can</i> cover magic, but the cooldown on that ability is longer than the duration, preventing him from serving in that role effectively.</li>
<li>His LB provides a powerful 45% general mitigation buff to the party for three turns.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sophia_2"><a href="/Sophia" title="Sophia">Sophia</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-116" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-116" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent magical chainer with elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Chaos_Wave" title="Chaos Wave">Chaos Wave</a> and <a href="/Quake" title="Quake">Quake</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sora_2"><a href="/Sora" title="Sora">Sora</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-117" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-117" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent physical chainer.</li>
<li>Has no imperils of his own.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> and <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> families. Also has a much weaker move from the <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a> family.</li>
<li>Burns through MP at an alarming rate.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Squall_2"><a href="/Squall" title="Squall">Squall</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-118" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-118" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Mediocre TDH physical chainer with a bit of elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>By dualcasting any of his Barrett skills with <a href="/Keen_Edge" title="Keen Edge">Keen Edge</a>, he can cap his own chains, but even with full TDH, his damage output remains lackluster.</li>
<li>His inability to imbue himself so that <a href="/Keen_Edge" title="Keen Edge">Keen Edge</a> can take advantage of imperils greatly limits his damage output.</li>
<li>Has no chaining partners and no utility.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Tiana_2"><a href="/Tiana" title="Tiana">Tiana</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-119" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-119" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very powerful earth magic chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Quake" title="Quake">Quake</a> family.</li>
<li>Can help to sustain the party's HP/MP via her limit burst.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Tidus_2"><a href="/Tidus" title="Tidus">Tidus</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-120" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-120" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good DH water physical chainer.</li>
<li>Technically chains with the <a href="/Quick_Hit" title="Quick Hit">Quick Hit</a> family, but his rotation is a mess. Constant switching between single cast, dual cast, and triple cast means he has no real partners.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Tifa_2"><a href="/Tifa" title="Tifa">Tifa</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-121" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-121" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent water physical chainer.</li>
<li>Requires several turns of ramp up.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Trance_Terra_2"><a href="/Trance_Terra" title="Trance Terra">Trance Terra</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-122" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-122" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Very powerful magic chainer with a bit of elemental flexibility.</li>
<li>Has very high damage on certain turns and very low damage on others. It averages out to a high number, but can be a problem if you need multiple turns of high damage in a row.</li>
<li>Very high MP consumption.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Veritas_of_the_Dark_2"><a href="/Veritas_of_the_Dark" title="Veritas of the Dark">Veritas of the Dark</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-123" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-123" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good dark physical chainer.</li>
<li>Has a bit of utility in the form of AoE mitigation, AoE full break, 74% ATK break on his LB, and AoE dark resistance.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Divine_Ruination" title="Divine Ruination">Divine Ruination</a> family.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Veritas_of_the_Flame_2"><a href="/Veritas_of_the_Flame" title="Veritas of the Flame">Veritas of the Flame</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-124" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-124" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Powerful fire finisher.</li>
<li>Can burst extremely hard via his cooldown.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Veritas_of_the_Light_2"><a href="/Veritas_of_the_Light" title="Veritas of the Light">Veritas of the Light</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-125" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-125" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Solid light hybrid AoE chainer.</li>
<li>Can cure all debuffs from a single ally, including berserk, charm, stop, imperils, and breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Viktor_Marchenko_2"><a href="/Viktor_Marchenko" title="Viktor Marchenko">Viktor Marchenko</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-126" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-126" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Provoke tank with subpar survivability but mediocre damage dealing capabilities.</li>
<li>Can either chain or finish with skills that scale off of DEF.</li>
<li>Can become immune to charm, stop, breaks, and ailments.</li>
<li>Can heal himself and restore his own MP.</li>
<li>Has dual-stat 50% AoE breaks, but they're split the wrong way.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Vincent_2"><a href="/Vincent" title="Vincent">Vincent</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-127" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-127" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Subpar physical chainer with no partners.</li>
<li>Has a single target 55% full break.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="White_Knight_Noel_2"><a href="/White_Knight_Noel" title="White Knight Noel">White Knight Noel</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-128" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-128" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Absurdly durable provoke and magic cover tank.</li>
<li>Has very little in the way of utility, but can chain with the <a href="/Freeze" title="Freeze">Freeze</a> and <a href="/Tornado" title="Tornado">Tornado</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Wilhelm_2"><a href="/Wilhelm" title="Wilhelm">Wilhelm</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-129" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-129" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Extremely powerful provoke and physical cover tank.</li>
<li>Has excellent utility in the form of his powerful mitigation LB, LB fill rate counter, and single-stat 60% ATK/MAG breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Yun_2"><a href="/Yun" title="Yun">Yun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-130" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-130" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Good fire physical chainer.</li>
<li>Chains with the <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> and <a href="/Chaining/Absolute_Mirror_of_Equity" title="Chaining/Absolute Mirror of Equity">Absolute Mirror of Equity</a> families.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Yuna_2"><a href="/Yuna" title="Yuna">Yuna</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-131" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-131" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent healer with Curaja and Reraise.</li>
<li>Also has great utility-- various Bar-ga resistance spells, esper gauge fill, and a powerful DEF/SPR buffs on her LB.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Yuraisha_2"><a href="/Yuraisha" title="Yuraisha">Yuraisha</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-132" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-132" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent support unit with powerful buffs.</li>
<li>Can provide large buffs to all stats, as well as all three types of mitigation.</li>
<li>Has AoE barriers, resistance buffs, and AoE HP/MP regen.</li>
<li>Can cure breaks.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Zargabaath_2"><a href="/Zargabaath" title="Zargabaath">Zargabaath</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=T-133" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Unit_Summaries_(7%E2%98%85_Units)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-133" title="Edit section: ">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Excellent support unit with powerful buffs.</li>
<li>Can massively buff stats and mitigation, especially via his LB.</li>
<li>Can temporarily provide break immunity.</li>
<li>Can reraise allies and provide massive HP/MP restoration to single targets.</li>
<li>Can chain with the <a href="/Octaslash" title="Octaslash">Octaslash</a> family.</li></ul>
